00134 //Creates a new player group, returning the unique ID of that group.  This is the first
00135 //step before adding waypoints and members to the player group.
00136 UINT8 CreateNewPlayerGroupDepartingFromSector( UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY )
00137 {
00138       GROUP *pNew;
00139       AssertMsg( ubSectorX >= 1 && ubSectorX <= 16, String( "CreateNewPlayerGroup with out of range sectorX value of %d", ubSectorX ) );
00140       AssertMsg( ubSectorY >= 1 && ubSectorY <= 16, String( "CreateNewPlayerGroup with out of range sectorY value of %d", ubSectorY ) );
00141       pNew = (GROUP*)MemAlloc( sizeof( GROUP ) );
00142       AssertMsg( pNew, "MemAlloc failure during CreateNewPlayerGroup." );
00143       memset( pNew, 0, sizeof( GROUP ) );
00144       pNew->pPlayerList = NULL;
00145       pNew->pWaypoints = NULL;
00146       pNew->ubSectorX = pNew->ubNextX = ubSectorX;
00147       pNew->ubSectorY = pNew->ubNextY = ubSectorY;
00148       pNew->ubOriginalSector = (UINT8)SECTOR( ubSectorX, ubSectorY );
00149       pNew->fPlayer = TRUE;
00150       pNew->ubMoveType = ONE_WAY;
00151       pNew->ubNextWaypointID = 0;
00152       pNew->ubFatigueLevel = 100;
00153       pNew->ubRestAtFatigueLevel = 0;
00154       pNew->ubTransportationMask = FOOT;
00155       pNew->fVehicle = FALSE;
00156       pNew->ubCreatedSectorID = pNew->ubOriginalSector;
00157       pNew->ubSectorIDOfLastReassignment = 255;
00158 
00159       return AddGroupToList( pNew );
00160 }

00191 //Allows you to add players to the group.
00192 BOOLEAN AddPlayerToGroup( UINT8 ubGroupID, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00193 {
00194       GROUP *pGroup;
00195       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer, *curr;
00196       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
00197       Assert( pGroup );
00198       pPlayer = (PLAYERGROUP*)MemAlloc( sizeof( PLAYERGROUP ) );
00199       Assert( pPlayer );
00200       AssertMsg( pGroup->fPlayer, "Attempting AddPlayerToGroup() on an ENEMY group!");
00201       pPlayer->pSoldier = pSoldier;
00202       pPlayer->ubProfileID = pSoldier->ubProfile;
00203       pPlayer->ubID = pSoldier->ubID;
00204       pPlayer->bFlags = 0;
00205       pPlayer->next = NULL;
00206 
00207 
00208       if( !pGroup->pPlayerList )
00209       {
00210             pGroup->pPlayerList = pPlayer;
00211             pGroup->ubGroupSize = 1;
00212             pGroup->ubPrevX = (UINT8)((pSoldier->ubPrevSectorID % 16) + 1);
00213             pGroup->ubPrevY = (UINT8)((pSoldier->ubPrevSectorID / 16) + 1);
00214             pGroup->ubSectorX = (UINT8)pSoldier->sSectorX;
00215             pGroup->ubSectorY = (UINT8)pSoldier->sSectorY;
00216             pGroup->ubSectorZ = (UINT8)pSoldier->bSectorZ;
00217             
00218             // set group id
00219             pSoldier->ubGroupID = ubGroupID;
00220 
00221             return TRUE;
00222       }
00223       else 
00224       {
00225             curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
00226             pSoldier->ubNumTraversalsAllowedToMerge = curr->pSoldier->ubNumTraversalsAllowedToMerge;
00227             pSoldier->ubDesiredSquadAssignment = curr->pSoldier->ubDesiredSquadAssignment;
00228             while( curr->next )
00229             {
00230                   if( curr->ubProfileID == pSoldier->ubProfile )
00231                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "Attempting to add an already existing merc to group (ubProfile=%d).", pSoldier->ubProfile ) );
00232                   curr = curr->next;
00233             }
00234             curr->next = pPlayer;
00235             
00236             // set group id
00237             pSoldier->ubGroupID = ubGroupID;
00238 
00239             pGroup->ubGroupSize++;
00240             return TRUE;
00241       }
00242 }

00245 // remove all grunts from player mvt grp
00246 BOOLEAN RemoveAllPlayersFromGroup( UINT8 ubGroupId )
00247 {
00248       GROUP *pGroup;
00249       
00250       // grab group id
00251       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupId );
00252 
00253       // init errors checks
00254       AssertMsg( pGroup, String( "Attempting to RemovePlayerFromGroup( %d ) from non-existant group", ubGroupId) );
00255

00258 
00259 BOOLEAN RemoveAllPlayersFromPGroup( GROUP *pGroup )
00260 {
00261       PLAYERGROUP *curr;
00262 
00263       AssertMsg( pGroup->fPlayer, "Attempting RemovePlayerFromGroup() on an ENEMY group!");
00264       
00265       curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
00266       while( curr )
00267       {
00268             pGroup->pPlayerList = pGroup->pPlayerList->next;
00269 
00270             curr->pSoldier->ubPrevSectorID = (UINT8)SECTOR( pGroup->ubPrevX, pGroup->ubPrevY );
00271             curr->pSoldier->ubGroupID = 0;
00272 
00273             MemFree( curr );
00274 
00275             curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
00276       }
00277       pGroup->ubGroupSize = 0;
00278       
00279       if( !pGroup->fPersistant )
00280       {     //remove the empty group
00281             RemovePGroup( pGroup );
00282       }
00283       else
00284       {
00285             CancelEmptyPersistentGroupMovement( pGroup );
00286       }
00287 
00288       return TRUE;
00289 }
00290 
00291 BOOLEAN RemovePlayerFromPGroup( GROUP *pGroup, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00292 {
00293       PLAYERGROUP *prev, *curr;
00294       AssertMsg( pGroup->fPlayer, "Attempting RemovePlayerFromGroup() on an ENEMY group!" );
00295 
00296       curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
00297       
00298       if( !curr )
00299       {
00300             return FALSE;
00301       }
00302 
00303       if( curr->pSoldier == pSoldier )
00304       { //possibly the only node
00305             pGroup->pPlayerList = pGroup->pPlayerList->next;
00306 
00307             //delete the node
00308             MemFree( curr );
00309             
00310             //process info for soldier
00311             pGroup->ubGroupSize--;
00312             pSoldier->ubPrevSectorID = (UINT8)SECTOR( pGroup->ubPrevX, pGroup->ubPrevY );
00313             pSoldier->ubGroupID = 0;
00314             
00315             // if there's nobody left in the group
00316             if( pGroup->ubGroupSize == 0 )
00317             {
00318                   if ( !pGroup->fPersistant )
00319                   {     //remove the empty group
00320                         RemovePGroup( pGroup );
00321                   }
00322                   else
00323                   {
00324                         CancelEmptyPersistentGroupMovement( pGroup );
00325                   }
00326             }
00327 
00328             return TRUE;
00329       }
00330       prev = NULL;
00331 
00332       while( curr )
00333       { //definately more than one node
00334 
00335             if( curr->pSoldier == pSoldier )
00336             {
00337                   //detach and delete the node
00338                   if( prev )
00339                   {
00340                         prev->next = curr->next;
00341                   }
00342                   MemFree( curr );
00343 
00344                   //process info for soldier
00345                   pSoldier->ubGroupID = 0;
00346                   pGroup->ubGroupSize--;
00347                   pSoldier->ubPrevSectorID = (UINT8)SECTOR( pGroup->ubPrevX, pGroup->ubPrevY );
00348 
00349                   return TRUE;
00350             }
00351 
00352             prev = curr;
00353             curr = curr->next;
00354       
00355       }
00356 
00357       // !curr
00358       return FALSE;
00359 }
00360 
00361 BOOLEAN RemovePlayerFromGroup( UINT8 ubGroupID, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00362 {
00363       GROUP *pGroup;
00364       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
00365 
00366       //KM : August 6, 1999 Patch fix
00367       //     Because the release build has no assertions, it was still possible for the group to be null,
00368       //     causing a crash.  Instead of crashing, it'll simply return false.
00369       if( !pGroup )
00370       {
00371             return FALSE;
00372       }
00373       //end
00374 
00375       AssertMsg( pGroup, String( "Attempting to RemovePlayerFromGroup( %d, %d ) from non-existant group", ubGroupID, pSoldier->ubProfile ) );
00376 
00377       return RemovePlayerFromPGroup( pGroup, pSoldier );
00378 }

00382 BOOLEAN GroupReversingDirectionsBetweenSectors( GROUP *pGroup, UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY, BOOLEAN fBuildingWaypoints )
00383 {
00384       // if we're not between sectors, or we are but we're continuing in the same direction as before
00385       if ( !GroupBetweenSectorsAndSectorXYIsInDifferentDirection( pGroup, ubSectorX, ubSectorY ) )
00386       {
00387             // then there's no need to reverse directions
00388             return FALSE;
00389       }
00390 
00391       //The new direction is reversed, so we have to go back to the sector we just left.
00392 
00393       //Search for the arrival event, and kill it!
00394       DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->ubGroupID );
00395 
00396       //Adjust the information in the group to reflect the new movement.
00397       pGroup->ubPrevX = pGroup->ubNextX;
00398       pGroup->ubPrevY = pGroup->ubNextY;
00399       pGroup->ubNextX = pGroup->ubSectorX;
00400       pGroup->ubNextY = pGroup->ubSectorY;
00401       pGroup->ubSectorX = pGroup->ubPrevX;
00402       pGroup->ubSectorY = pGroup->ubPrevY;
00403 
00404       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
00405       {
00406             // ARM: because we've changed the group's ubSectoryX and ubSectorY, we must now also go and change the sSectorX and
00407             // sSectorY of all the soldiers in this group so that they stay in synch.  Otherwise pathing and movement problems
00408             // will result since the group is in one place while the merc is in another...
00409             SetLocationOfAllPlayerSoldiersInGroup( pGroup, pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, 0 );
00410       }
00411 
00412 
00413       // IMPORTANT: The traverse time doesn't change just because we reverse directions!  It takes the same time no matter
00414       // which direction you're going in!  This becomes critical in case the player reverse directions again before moving!
00415 
00416       // The time it takes to arrive there will be exactly the amount of time we have been moving away from it.
00417       SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, pGroup->uiTraverseTime - pGroup->uiArrivalTime + GetWorldTotalMin() * 2 );
00418 
00419       // if they're not already there
00420       if( pGroup->uiArrivalTime > GetWorldTotalMin() )
00421       {
00422             //Post the replacement event to move back to the previous sector!
00423             AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->uiArrivalTime, pGroup->ubGroupID );
00424 
00425             if( pGroup->fPlayer )
00426             {
00427                   if( ( pGroup->uiArrivalTime - ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE_DELAY ) > GetWorldTotalMin( ) )
00428                   {
00429                         // Post the about to arrive event
00430                         AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE, pGroup->uiArrivalTime - ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE_DELAY, pGroup->ubGroupID ); 
00431                   }
00432             }
00433       }
00434       else
00435       {
00436             // IMPORTANT: this can't be called during RebuildWayPointsForGroupPath(), since it will clear the mercpath
00437             // prematurely by assuming the mercs are now at their final destination when only the first waypoint is in place!!!
00438             // To handle this situation, RebuildWayPointsForGroupPath() will issue it's own call after it's ready for it.
00439             if ( !fBuildingWaypoints )
00440             {
00441                   // never really left.  Must set check for battle TRUE in order for HandleNonCombatGroupArrival() to run!
00442                   GroupArrivedAtSector( pGroup->ubGroupID, TRUE, TRUE );
00443             }
00444       }
00445 
00446 
00447       return TRUE;
00448 }
00449 
00450 
00451 
00452 BOOLEAN GroupBetweenSectorsAndSectorXYIsInDifferentDirection( GROUP *pGroup, UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY )
00453 {
00454       INT32 currDX, currDY, newDX, newDY;
00455       UINT8 ubNumUnalignedAxes = 0;
00456 
00457 
00458       if( !pGroup->fBetweenSectors )
00459             return( FALSE );
00460 
00461 
00462       // Determine the direction the group is currently traveling in
00463       currDX = pGroup->ubNextX - pGroup->ubSectorX;
00464       currDY = pGroup->ubNextY - pGroup->ubSectorY;
00465 
00466       //Determine the direction the group would need to travel in to reach the given sector
00467       newDX = ubSectorX - pGroup->ubSectorX;
00468       newDY = ubSectorY - pGroup->ubSectorY;
00469 
00470       // clip the new dx/dy values to +/- 1
00471       if( newDX )
00472       {
00473             ubNumUnalignedAxes++;
00474             newDX /= abs( newDX );
00475       }
00476       if( newDY )
00477       {
00478             ubNumUnalignedAxes++;
00479             newDY /= abs( newDY );
00480       }
00481 
00482       // error checking
00483       if( ubNumUnalignedAxes > 1 )
00484       {
00485             AssertMsg( FALSE, String( "Checking a diagonal move for direction change, groupID %d. AM-0", pGroup->ubGroupID ) );
00486             return FALSE;
00487       }
00488 
00489       // Compare the dx/dy's.  If they're exactly the same, group is travelling in the same direction as before, so we're not
00490       // changing directions.
00491       // Note that 90-degree orthogonal changes are considered changing direction, as well as the full 180-degree reversal.
00492       // That's because the party must return to the previous sector in each of those cases, too.
00493       if( currDX == newDX && currDY == newDY )
00494             return( FALSE );
00495 
00496 
00497       // yes, we're between sectors, and we'd be changing direction to go to the given sector
00498       return( TRUE );
00499 }
00500 
00501 
00502 //Appends a waypoint to the end of the list.  Waypoint MUST be on the
00503 //same horizontal or vertical level as the last waypoint added.
00504 BOOLEAN AddWaypointToPGroup( GROUP* pGroup, UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY ) //Same, but overloaded
00505 {
00506       WAYPOINT *pWay;
00507       UINT8 ubNumAlignedAxes = 0;
00508       BOOLEAN fReversingDirection = FALSE;
00509 
00510 
00511       AssertMsg( ubSectorX >= 1 && ubSectorX <= 16, String( "AddWaypointToPGroup with out of range sectorX value of %d", ubSectorX ) );
00512       AssertMsg( ubSectorY >= 1 && ubSectorY <= 16, String( "AddWaypointToPGroup with out of range sectorY value of %d", ubSectorY ) );
00513 
00514       if( !pGroup )
00515             return FALSE;
00516 
00517       //At this point, we have the group, and a valid coordinate.  Now we must
00518       //determine that this waypoint will be aligned exclusively to either the x or y axis of
00519       //the last waypoint in the list.
00520       pWay = pGroup->pWaypoints;
00521       if( !pWay )
00522       {
00523             if( GroupReversingDirectionsBetweenSectors( pGroup, ubSectorX, ubSectorY, TRUE ) )
00524             {
00525                   if( pGroup->fPlayer )
00526                   {
00527                         // because we reversed, we must add the new current sector back at the head of everyone's mercpath
00528                         AddSectorToFrontOfMercPathForAllSoldiersInGroup( pGroup, pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
00529                   }
00530 
00531                   //Very special case that requiring specific coding.  Check out the comments
00532                   //at the above function for more information.
00533                   fReversingDirection = TRUE;
00534                   // ARM:  Kris - new rulez.  Must still fall through and add a waypoint anyway!!!
00535             }
00536             else
00537             { //No waypoints, so compare against the current location.
00538                   if( pGroup->ubSectorX == ubSectorX )
00539                   {
00540                         ubNumAlignedAxes++;
00541                   }
00542                   if( pGroup->ubSectorY == ubSectorY )
00543                   {
00544                         ubNumAlignedAxes++;
00545                   }
00546             }
00547       }
00548       else 
00549       {     //we do have a waypoint list, so go to the last entry
00550             while( pWay->next )
00551             {
00552                   pWay = pWay->next;
00553             }
00554             //now, we are pointing to the last waypoint in the list
00555             if( pWay->x == ubSectorX )
00556             {
00557                   ubNumAlignedAxes++;
00558             }
00559             if( pWay->y == ubSectorY )
00560             {
00561                   ubNumAlignedAxes++;
00562             }
00563       }
00564 
00565       if ( !fReversingDirection )
00566       {
00567             if( ubNumAlignedAxes == 0 )
00568             {
00569                   AssertMsg( FALSE, String( "Invalid DIAGONAL waypoint being added for groupID %d. AM-0", pGroup->ubGroupID ) );
00570                   return FALSE;
00571             }
00572 
00573             if( ubNumAlignedAxes >= 2 )
00574             {
00575                   AssertMsg( FALSE, String( "Invalid IDENTICAL waypoint being added for groupID %d. AM-0", pGroup->ubGroupID ) );
00576                   return FALSE;
00577             }
00578 
00579             // has to be different in exactly 1 axis to be a valid new waypoint
00580             Assert( ubNumAlignedAxes == 1 );
00581       }
00582 
00583 
00584       if( !pWay )
00585       { //We are adding the first waypoint.
00586             pGroup->pWaypoints = (WAYPOINT*)MemAlloc( sizeof( WAYPOINT ) );
00587             pWay = pGroup->pWaypoints;
00588       }
00589       else
00590       { //Add the waypoint to the end of the list
00591             pWay->next = (WAYPOINT*)MemAlloc( sizeof( WAYPOINT ) );
00592             pWay = pWay->next;
00593       }
00594 
00595       AssertMsg( pWay, "Failed to allocate memory for waypoint." ); 
00596 
00597       //Fill in the information for the new waypoint.
00598       pWay->x = ubSectorX;
00599       pWay->y = ubSectorY;
00600       pWay->next = NULL;
00601 
00602       //IMPORTANT:
00603       //The first waypoint added actually initiates the group's movement to the next sector.
00604       if( pWay == pGroup->pWaypoints )          
00605       {
00606             // don't do this if we have reversed directions!!!  In that case, the required work has already been done back there
00607             if ( !fReversingDirection )
00608             {
00609                   //We need to calculate the next sector the group is moving to and post an event for it.
00610                   InitiateGroupMovementToNextSector( pGroup );
00611             }
00612       }
00613 
00614       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
00615       {
00616             PLAYERGROUP *curr;
00617             //Also, nuke any previous "tactical traversal" information.
00618             curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
00619             while( curr )
00620             {
00621                   curr->pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = 0;
00622                   curr = curr->next;
00623             }
00624       }
00625 
00626       return TRUE;
00627 }
00628 
00629 BOOLEAN AddWaypointToGroup( UINT8 ubGroupID, UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY )
00630 {
00631       GROUP *pGroup;
00632       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
00633       return AddWaypointToPGroup( pGroup, ubSectorX, ubSectorY );
00634 }

00641       return AddWaypointIDToPGroup( pGroup, ubSectorID );
00642 }

00648       ubSectorX = SECTORX( ubSectorID );
00649       ubSectorY = SECTORY( ubSectorID );

00663       ubSectorX = ( UINT8 ) GET_X_FROM_STRATEGIC_INDEX( uiSectorID );
00664       ubSectorY = ( UINT8 ) GET_Y_FROM_STRATEGIC_INDEX( uiSectorID );
00665       return AddWaypointToPGroup( pGroup, ubSectorX, ubSectorY );
00666 }

00668 
00669 //Enemy grouping functions -- private use by the strategic AI.
00670 //............................................................
00671 GROUP* CreateNewEnemyGroupDepartingFromSector( UINT32 uiSector, UINT8 ubNumAdmins, UINT8 ubNumTroops, UINT8 ubNumElites )
00672 {
00673       GROUP *pNew;
00674       AssertMsg( uiSector >= 0 && uiSector <= 255, String( "CreateNewEnemyGroup with out of range value of %d", uiSector ) );
00675       pNew = (GROUP*)MemAlloc( sizeof( GROUP ) );
00676       AssertMsg( pNew, "MemAlloc failure during CreateNewEnemyGroup." );
00677       memset( pNew, 0, sizeof( GROUP ) );
00678       pNew->pEnemyGroup = (ENEMYGROUP*)MemAlloc( sizeof( ENEMYGROUP ) );
00679       AssertMsg( pNew->pEnemyGroup, "MemAlloc failure during enemy group creation." );
00680       memset( pNew->pEnemyGroup, 0, sizeof( ENEMYGROUP ) );
00681       pNew->pWaypoints = NULL;
00682       pNew->ubSectorX = (UINT8)SECTORX( uiSector );
00683       pNew->ubSectorY = (UINT8)SECTORY( uiSector );
00684       pNew->ubOriginalSector = (UINT8)uiSector;
00685       pNew->fPlayer = FALSE;
00686       pNew->ubMoveType = CIRCULAR;
00687       pNew->ubNextWaypointID = 0;
00688       pNew->ubFatigueLevel = 100;
00689       pNew->ubRestAtFatigueLevel = 0;
00690       pNew->pEnemyGroup->ubNumAdmins = ubNumAdmins;
00691       pNew->pEnemyGroup->ubNumTroops = ubNumTroops;
00692       pNew->pEnemyGroup->ubNumElites = ubNumElites;
00693       pNew->ubGroupSize = (UINT8)(ubNumTroops + ubNumElites);
00694       pNew->ubTransportationMask = FOOT;
00695       pNew->fVehicle = FALSE;
00696       pNew->ubCreatedSectorID = pNew->ubOriginalSector;
00697       pNew->ubSectorIDOfLastReassignment = 255;
00698 
00699 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00700       {
00701             UINT16 str[ 512 ];
00702             if( PlayerMercsInSector( pNew->ubSectorX, pNew->ubSectorY, 0 ) || CountAllMilitiaInSector( pNew->ubSectorX, pNew->ubSectorY ) )
00703             {
00704                   swprintf( str, L"Attempting to send enemy troops from player occupied location.  "
00705                                                              L"Please ALT+TAB out of the game before doing anything else and send 'Strategic Decisions.txt' "
00706                                                              L"and this message.  You'll likely need to revert to a previous save.  If you can reproduce this "
00707                                                              L"with a save close to this event, that would really help me! -- KM:0" );
00708                   DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00709             }
00710             else if( pNew->ubGroupSize > 25 )
00711             {
00712                   swprintf( str, L"Strategic AI warning:  Creating an enemy group containing %d soldiers "
00713                                                              L"(%d admins, %d troops, %d elites) in sector %c%d.  This message is a temporary test message "
00714                                                              L"to evaluate a potential problems with very large enemy groups.",
00715                                                              pNew->ubGroupSize, ubNumAdmins, ubNumTroops, ubNumElites,
00716                                                              pNew->ubSectorY + 'A' - 1, pNew->ubSectorX );
00717                   DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
00718             }
00719       }
00720 #endif
00721 
00722       if( AddGroupToList( pNew ) )
00723             return pNew;
00724       return NULL;
00725 }
00726 
00727 //INTERNAL LIST MANIPULATION FUNCTIONS
00728 
00729 //When adding any new group to the list, this is what must be done:
00730 //1)  Find the first unused ID (unique)
00731 //2)  Assign that ID to the new group
00732 //3)  Insert the group at the end of the list.
00733 UINT8 AddGroupToList( GROUP *pGroup )
00734 {
00735       GROUP *curr;
00736       UINT32 bit, index, mask;
00737       UINT8 ID = 0;
00738       //First, find a unique ID
00739       while( ++ID )
00740       {
00741             index = ID / 32;
00742             bit = ID % 32;
00743             mask = 1 << bit;
00744             if( !(uniqueIDMask[ index ] & mask) )
00745             { //found a free ID
00746                   pGroup->ubGroupID = ID;
00747                   uniqueIDMask[ index ] += mask;
00748                   //add group to list now.
00749                   curr = gpGroupList;
00750                   if( curr )
00751                   { //point to the last item in list.
00752                         while( curr->next )
00753                               curr = curr->next;
00754                         curr->next = pGroup;
00755                   }
00756                   else //new list
00757                         gpGroupList = pGroup;
00758                   pGroup->next = NULL;
00759                   return ID;
00760             }
00761       }
00762       return FALSE;
00763 }
00764 
00765 void RemoveGroupIdFromList( UINT8 ubId )
00766 {
00767       GROUP *pGroup;
00768 
00769       if( ubId == 0 )
00770       {
00771             // no group, leave
00772             return;
00773       }
00774 
00775       // get group
00776       pGroup = GetGroup( ubId );
00777 
00778       // is there in fact a group?
00779       Assert( pGroup );
00780 
00781       // now remove this group
00782       RemoveGroupFromList( pGroup );
00783 
00784 }
00785 //Destroys the waypoint list, detaches group from list, then deallocated the memory for the group
00786 void RemoveGroupFromList( GROUP *pGroup )
00787 {
00788       GROUP *curr, *temp;
00789       curr = gpGroupList;
00790       if( !curr )
00791             return;
00792       if( curr == pGroup )
00793       { //Removing head
00794             gpGroupList = curr->next;
00795       }
00796       else while( curr->next )
00797       { //traverse the list
00798             if( curr->next == pGroup )
00799             { //the next node is the one we want to remove
00800                   temp = curr;
00801                   //curr now points to the nod we want to remove
00802                   curr = curr->next;
00803                   //detach the node from the list
00804                   temp->next = curr->next;
00805                   break;
00806             }
00807             curr = curr->next;            
00808       }
00809 
00810 
00811       if( curr == pGroup )
00812       { //we found the group, so now remove it.
00813             UINT32 bit, index, mask;
00814             
00815             //clear the unique group ID
00816             index = pGroup->ubGroupID / 32;
00817             bit = pGroup->ubGroupID % 32;
00818             mask = 1 << bit;
00819 
00820             if( !(uniqueIDMask[ index ] & mask) )
00821             {
00822                   mask = mask;
00823             }
00824 
00825             uniqueIDMask[ index ] -= mask;
00826 
00827             MemFree( curr );
00828             curr = NULL;
00829       }
00830 }
00831 
00832 GROUP* GetGroup( UINT8 ubGroupID )
00833 {
00834       GROUP *curr;
00835       curr = gpGroupList;
00836       while( curr )
00837       {
00838             if( curr->ubGroupID == ubGroupID )
00839                   return curr;
00840             curr = curr->next;
00841       }
00842       return NULL;
00843 }
00844 
00845 void HandleImportantPBIQuote( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, GROUP *pInitiatingBattleGroup )
00846 {
00847       // wake merc up for THIS quote
00848       if( pSoldier->fMercAsleep )
00849       {
00850             TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, QUOTE_ENEMY_PRESENCE, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SLEEP, 0,0 );
00851             TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, QUOTE_ENEMY_PRESENCE, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_BEGINPREBATTLEINTERFACE, (UINT32)pInitiatingBattleGroup, 0 );
00852             TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, QUOTE_ENEMY_PRESENCE, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SLEEP, 1,0 );
00853       }
00854       else
00855       {
00856             TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, QUOTE_ENEMY_PRESENCE, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_BEGINPREBATTLEINTERFACE, (UINT32)pInitiatingBattleGroup, 0 );
00857       }
00858 }
00859 
00860 //If this is called, we are setting the game up to bring up the prebattle interface.  Before doing so,
00861 //one of the involved mercs will pipe up.  When he is finished, we automatically go into the mapscreen,
00862 //regardless of the mode we are in.
00863 void PrepareForPreBattleInterface( GROUP *pPlayerDialogGroup, GROUP *pInitiatingBattleGroup )
00864 {
00865       // ATE; Changed alogrithm here...
00866       // We first loop through the group and save ubID's ov valid guys to talk....
00867       // ( Can't if sleeping, unconscious, and EPC, etc....
00868       UINT8                   ubMercsInGroup[ 20 ] = { 0 };
00869       UINT8                   ubNumMercs = 0;
00870       UINT8                   ubChosenMerc;
00871       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00872       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
00873 
00874       if( fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle ) 
00875       {
00876             AssertMsg( 0, "fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle is set before attempting to bring up PBI.  Please send PRIOR save if possible and details on anything that just happened before this battle." );
00877             return;
00878       }
00879 
00880       // Pipe up with quote...
00881       AssertMsg( pPlayerDialogGroup, "Didn't get a player dialog group for prebattle interface." );
00882 
00883       pPlayer = pPlayerDialogGroup->pPlayerList;
00884       AssertMsg( pPlayer, String( "Player group %d doesn't have *any* players in it!  (Finding dialog group)", pPlayerDialogGroup->ubGroupID ) );
00885 
00886 
00887       while( pPlayer != NULL )
00888       {
00889             pSoldier = pPlayer->pSoldier;
00890 
00891             if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) &&
00892                               !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) && !AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) )
00893             {
00894                   ubMercsInGroup[ ubNumMercs ] = pSoldier->ubID;
00895                   ubNumMercs++;
00896             }
00897 
00898             pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
00899       }
00900 
00901       //Set music
00902       SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_ENEMYPRESENT );
00903 
00904       if( gfTacticalTraversal && pInitiatingBattleGroup == gpTacticalTraversalGroup || 
00905                   pInitiatingBattleGroup && !pInitiatingBattleGroup->fPlayer && 
00906                   pInitiatingBattleGroup->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX &&
00907               pInitiatingBattleGroup->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY && !gbWorldSectorZ )
00908       {     // At least say quote....
00909             if ( ubNumMercs > 0 )
00910             {
00911                   if( pPlayerDialogGroup->uiFlags & GROUPFLAG_JUST_RETREATED_FROM_BATTLE )
00912                   {
00913                         gfCantRetreatInPBI = TRUE;
00914                   }
00915 
00916                   ubChosenMerc = (UINT8)Random( ubNumMercs );
00917 
00918                   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubMercsInGroup[ ubChosenMerc ] ];
00919                   gpTacticalTraversalChosenSoldier = pSoldier;
00920 
00921                   if( !gfTacticalTraversal )
00922                   {
00923                         HandleImportantPBIQuote( pSoldier, pInitiatingBattleGroup );
00924                   }
00925 
00926                   InterruptTime();
00927                   PauseGame();
00928                   LockPauseState( 11 );
00929 
00930                   if( !gfTacticalTraversal )
00931                         fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle = TRUE;
00932             }
00933             return;
00934       }
00935 
00936 
00937       // Randomly pick a valid merc from the list we have created!
00938       if ( ubNumMercs > 0 )
00939       {
00940             if( pPlayerDialogGroup->uiFlags & GROUPFLAG_JUST_RETREATED_FROM_BATTLE )
00941             {
00942                   gfCantRetreatInPBI = TRUE;
00943             }
00944 
00945             ubChosenMerc = (UINT8)Random( ubNumMercs );
00946 
00947             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubMercsInGroup[ ubChosenMerc ] ];
00948 
00949             HandleImportantPBIQuote( pSoldier, pInitiatingBattleGroup );
00950             InterruptTime();
00951             PauseGame();
00952             LockPauseState( 12 );
00953 
00954             // disable exit from mapscreen and what not until face done talking
00955             fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle = TRUE;
00956       }
00957       else
00958       {
00959             // ATE: What if we have unconscious guys, etc....
00960             // We MUST start combat, but donot play quote...
00961             InitPreBattleInterface( pInitiatingBattleGroup, TRUE );
00962       }
00963 }
00964 
00965 
00966 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00967       extern void ValidatePlayersAreInOneGroupOnly();
00968 #endif
00969 
00970 
00971 BOOLEAN CheckConditionsForBattle( GROUP *pGroup )
00972 {
00973       GROUP *curr;
00974       GROUP *pPlayerDialogGroup = NULL;
00975       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
00976       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00977       BOOLEAN fBattlePending = FALSE;
00978       BOOLEAN fPossibleQueuedBattle = FALSE;
00979       BOOLEAN fAliveMerc = FALSE;
00980       BOOLEAN fMilitiaPresent = FALSE;
00981       BOOLEAN fCombatAbleMerc = FALSE;
00982       BOOLEAN fBloodCatAmbush = FALSE;
00983 
00984       if( gfWorldLoaded )
00985       { //look for people arriving in the currently loaded sector.  This handles reinforcements.
00986             curr = FindMovementGroupInSector( (UINT8)gWorldSectorX, (UINT8)gWorldSectorY, TRUE );
00987             if( !gbWorldSectorZ && PlayerMercsInSector( (UINT8)gWorldSectorX, (UINT8)gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ ) && 
00988                         pGroup->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY && 
00989                         curr )
00990             { //Reinforcements have arrived!
00991                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00992                   if( guiCurrentScreen == AIVIEWER_SCREEN )
00993                   {
00994                         gfExitViewer = TRUE;
00995                   }
00996                   #endif
00997                   if( gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
00998                   {
00999                         HandleArrivalOfReinforcements( pGroup );
01000                         return( TRUE );
01001                   }
01002             }
01003       }
01004 
01005       if( !DidGameJustStart() )
01006       {
01007             gubEnemyEncounterCode = NO_ENCOUNTER_CODE;
01008       }
01009 
01010       HandleOtherGroupsArrivingSimultaneously( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, pGroup->ubSectorZ );
01011       
01012       curr = gpGroupList;
01013       while( curr )
01014       {
01015             if( curr->fPlayer && curr->ubGroupSize )
01016             {
01017                   if( !curr->fBetweenSectors )
01018                   {
01019                         if( curr->ubSectorX == pGroup->ubSectorX && curr->ubSectorY == pGroup->ubSectorY && !curr->ubSectorZ )
01020                         {
01021                               if( !GroupHasInTransitDeadOrPOWMercs( curr ) &&
01022                                           (!IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( curr ) || !fHelicopterIsAirBorne) &&
01023                                           (!curr->fVehicle || NumberMercsInVehicleGroup( curr )) )
01024                               {
01025                                     //Now, a player group is in this sector.  Determine if the group contains any mercs that can fight.  
01026                                     //Vehicles, EPCs and the robot doesn't count.  Mercs below OKLIFE do.
01027                                     pPlayer = curr->pPlayerList;
01028                                     while( pPlayer )
01029                                     {
01030                                           pSoldier = pPlayer->pSoldier;
01031                                           if( !(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) )
01032                                           {
01033                                                 if( !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) && 
01034                                                             !AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) &&
01035                                                             pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
01036                                                 {
01037                                                       fCombatAbleMerc = TRUE;
01038                                                 }
01039                                                 if( pSoldier->bLife > 0 )
01040                                                 {
01041                                                       fAliveMerc = TRUE;
01042                                                 }
01043                                           }
01044                                           pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
01045                                     }
01046                                     if( !pPlayerDialogGroup && fCombatAbleMerc )
01047                                     {
01048                                           pPlayerDialogGroup = curr;
01049                                     }
01050                                     if( fCombatAbleMerc )
01051                                     {
01052                                           break;
01053                                     }
01054                               }
01055                         }
01056                   }
01057             }
01058             curr = curr->next;
01059       }
01060 
01061       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
01062       {
01063             pPlayerDialogGroup = pGroup;
01064             
01065             if( NumEnemiesInSector( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY ) )
01066             {
01067                   fBattlePending = TRUE;
01068             }
01069 
01070             if( pGroup->uiFlags & GROUPFLAG_HIGH_POTENTIAL_FOR_AMBUSH && fBattlePending )
01071             { //This group has just arrived in a new sector from an adjacent sector that he retreated from
01072                   //If this battle is an encounter type battle, then there is a 90% chance that the battle will
01073                   //become an ambush scenario.
01074                   gfHighPotentialForAmbush = TRUE;
01075             }
01076 
01077             //If there are bloodcats in this sector, then it internally checks and handles it
01078             if( TestForBloodcatAmbush( pGroup ) )
01079             {
01080                   fBloodCatAmbush = TRUE;
01081                   fBattlePending = TRUE;
01082             }
01083 
01084             if( fBattlePending && (!fBloodCatAmbush || gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE) )
01085             {     
01086                   if( PossibleToCoordinateSimultaneousGroupArrivals( pGroup ) )
01087                   {
01088                         return FALSE;
01089                   }
01090             }
01091       }
01092       else
01093       {
01094             if( CountAllMilitiaInSector( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY ) )
01095             {
01096                   fMilitiaPresent = TRUE;
01097                   fBattlePending = TRUE;
01098             }
01099             if( fAliveMerc )
01100             {
01101                   fBattlePending = TRUE;
01102             }
01103       }
01104 
01105       if( !fAliveMerc && !fMilitiaPresent )
01106       { //empty vehicle, everyone dead, don't care.  Enemies don't care.
01107             return FALSE;
01108       }
01109 
01110       if( fBattlePending )
01111       {     //A battle is pending, but the player's could be all unconcious or dead.
01112             //Go through every group until we find at least one concious merc.  The looping will determine
01113             //if there are any live mercs and/or concious ones.  If there are no concious mercs, but alive ones,
01114             //then we will go straight to autoresolve, where the enemy will likely annihilate them or capture them.
01115             //If there are no alive mercs, then there is nothing anybody can do.  The enemy will completely ignore
01116             //this, and continue on.
01117             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01118                   ValidateGroups( pGroup );
01119             #endif
01120 
01121             if( gubNumGroupsArrivedSimultaneously )
01122             { //Because this is a battle case, clear all the group flags 
01123                   curr = gpGroupList;
01124                   while( curr && gubNumGroupsArrivedSimultaneously )
01125                   {
01126                         if( curr->uiFlags & GROUPFLAG_GROUP_ARRIVED_SIMULTANEOUSLY )
01127                         {
01128                               curr->uiFlags &= ~GROUPFLAG_GROUP_ARRIVED_SIMULTANEOUSLY;
01129                               gubNumGroupsArrivedSimultaneously--;
01130                         }
01131                         curr = curr->next;            
01132                   }
01133             }
01134 
01135             gpInitPrebattleGroup = pGroup;
01136 
01137             if( gubEnemyEncounterCode == BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE || gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE )
01138             {
01139                   NotifyPlayerOfBloodcatBattle( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
01140                   return TRUE;
01141             }
01142 
01143             if( !fCombatAbleMerc )
01144             { //Prepare for instant autoresolve.
01145                   gfDelayAutoResolveStart = TRUE;
01146                   gfUsePersistantPBI = TRUE;
01147                   if( fMilitiaPresent )
01148                   {
01149                         NotifyPlayerOfInvasionByEnemyForces( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, 0, TriggerPrebattleInterface );
01150 
01151                         if( GetTownIdForSector( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY ) == BLANK_SECTOR)
01152                         {
01153 //                            UINT16 str[ 256 ];
01154 //                            UINT16 uiSectorC = L'A' + pGroup->ubSectorY - 1;
01155 //                            swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_DIALOG_ENEMIES_ATTACK_MILITIA ], uiSectorC, pGroup->ubSectorX );
01156 //                            DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, TriggerPrebattleInterface );
01157                               TriggerPrebattleInterface(1);
01158                         }
01159                   }
01160                   else
01161                   {
01162                         UINT16 str[ 256 ];
01163                         UINT16 pSectorStr[ 128 ];
01164                         GetSectorIDString( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, pGroup->ubSectorZ , pSectorStr, TRUE );
01165                         swprintf( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_DIALOG_ENEMIES_ATTACK_UNCONCIOUSMERCS ], pSectorStr );
01166                         DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, TriggerPrebattleInterface );
01167                   }
01168             }
01169 
01170             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01171                   if( guiCurrentScreen == AIVIEWER_SCREEN )
01172                         gfExitViewer = TRUE;
01173             #endif
01174 
01175             if( pPlayerDialogGroup )
01176             {
01177                   if( !pGroup->ubSectorZ )MilitiaHelpFromAdjacentSectors( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
01178                   PrepareForPreBattleInterface( pPlayerDialogGroup, pGroup );
01179             }
01180             return TRUE;
01181       }
01182       return FALSE;
01183 }

01193 void DeployGroupToSector( GROUP *pGroup )
01194 {
01195       Assert( pGroup );

01198             //Update the sector positions of the players...
01199             return;
01200       }
01201       //Assuming enemy code from here on...
