01203 
01204 //This will get called after a battle is auto-resolved or automatically after arriving
01205 //at the next sector during a move and the area is clear.
01206 void CalculateNextMoveIntention( GROUP *pGroup )
01207 {
01208       INT32 i;
01209       WAYPOINT *wp;
01210 
01211       Assert( pGroup );
01212 
01213       //TEMP:  Ignore resting...
01214 
01215       //Should be surely an enemy group that has just made a new decision to go elsewhere!
01216       if( pGroup->fBetweenSectors )
01217       {
01218             return;
01219       }
01220 
01221       if( !pGroup->pWaypoints )
01222       {
01223             return;
01224       }
01225 
01226       //If the waypoints have been cancelled, then stop moving.
01227       /*
01228       if( pGroup->fWaypointsCancelled )
01229       {
01230             DeployGroupToSector( pGroup );
01231             return;
01232       }
01233       */
01234 
01235       //Determine if we are at a waypoint.
01236       i = pGroup->ubNextWaypointID;
01237       wp = pGroup->pWaypoints;
01238       while( i-- )
01239       { //Traverse through the waypoint list to the next waypoint ID
01240             Assert( wp );
01241             wp = wp->next;
01242       }
01243       Assert( wp );
01244 
01245       //We have the next waypoint, now check if we are actually there.
01246       if( pGroup->ubSectorX == wp->x && pGroup->ubSectorY == wp->y )
01247       { //We have reached the next waypoint, so now determine what the next waypoint is.
01248             switch( pGroup->ubMoveType )
01249             {
01250                   case ONE_WAY:
01251                         if( !wp->next )
01252                         { //No more waypoints, so we've reached the destination.
01253                               DeployGroupToSector( pGroup );
01254                               return;
01255                         }
01256                         //Advance destination to next waypoint ID
01257                         pGroup->ubNextWaypointID++;
01258                         break;
01259                   case CIRCULAR:
01260                         wp = wp->next;
01261                         if( !wp )
01262                         {     //reached the end of the patrol route.  Set to the first waypoint in list, indefinately.
01263                               //NOTE:  If the last waypoint isn't exclusively aligned to the x or y axis of the first 
01264                               //                 waypoint, there will be an assertion failure inside the waypoint movement code.
01265                               pGroup->ubNextWaypointID = 0;
01266                         }
01267                         else
01268                               pGroup->ubNextWaypointID++;
01269                         break;
01270                   case ENDTOEND_FORWARDS:
01271                         wp = wp->next;
01272                         if( !wp )
01273                         {
01274                               AssertMsg( pGroup->ubNextWaypointID, "EndToEnd patrol group needs more than one waypoint!" );
01275                               pGroup->ubNextWaypointID--;
01276                               pGroup->ubMoveType = ENDTOEND_BACKWARDS;
01277                         }
01278                         else
01279                               pGroup->ubNextWaypointID++;
01280                         break;
01281                   case ENDTOEND_BACKWARDS:
01282                         if( !pGroup->ubNextWaypointID )
01283                         {
01284                               pGroup->ubNextWaypointID++;
01285                               pGroup->ubMoveType = ENDTOEND_FORWARDS;
01286                         }
01287                         else
01288                               pGroup->ubNextWaypointID--;
01289                         break;
01290             }
01291       }
01292       InitiateGroupMovementToNextSector( pGroup );
01293 }
01294 
01295 BOOLEAN AttemptToMergeSeparatedGroups( GROUP *pGroup, BOOLEAN fDecrementTraversals )
01296 {
01297       GROUP *curr = NULL;
01298       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL, *pCharacter = NULL;
01299       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer = NULL;
01300       BOOLEAN fSuccess = FALSE;
01301       #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01302             INT32 counter = 0;      
01303       #endif
01304       return FALSE;
01305 #if 0
01306       //First, make sure that we have a player group that isn't empty
01307       if( !pGroup->fPlayer || !pGroup->ubGroupSize )
01308             return FALSE;
01309       //If our group doesn't have any traversals left to be allowed to merge, then no chance.
01310       if( !pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->ubNumTraversalsAllowedToMerge )
01311             return FALSE;
01312 
01313       //Reset the merged flags because this group has just arrived in a new sector
01314       pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
01315       while( pPlayer )
01316       {
01317             pPlayer->pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= ~SOLDIER_IS_TACTICALLY_VALID;
01318             pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
01319       }
01320 
01321       //Now, because the group just arrived in the sector, and he currently is allowed to merge, then
01322       //decrement that num traversals.
01323       if( fDecrementTraversals )
01324       {
01325             pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
01326             while( pPlayer )
01327             {
01328                   if( pPlayer->pSoldier->ubNumTraversalsAllowedToMerge == 100 )
01329                         pPlayer->pSoldier->ubNumTraversalsAllowedToMerge = 0;
01330                   else
01331                         pPlayer->pSoldier->ubNumTraversalsAllowedToMerge--;
01332                   pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
01333             }
01334       }
01335       curr = gpGroupList;
01336       if( pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->ubDesiredSquadAssignment != NO_ASSIGNMENT )
01337       { //This group is looking for another group to merge with.
01338             while( curr )
01339             {
01340                   if( curr != pGroup && curr->fPlayer && curr->ubGroupSize )
01341                   { //We have a player group with members
01342                         if( curr->pPlayerList->pSoldier->ubNumTraversalsAllowedToMerge )
01343                         { //This group is allowed to merge
01344                               if( curr->ubSectorX == pGroup->ubSectorX && curr->ubSectorY == pGroup->ubSectorY &&
01345                                     curr->pPlayerList->pSoldier->bSectorZ == pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->bSectorZ )
01346                               { //This group is in the same sector as us
01347                                     if( curr->pPlayerList->pSoldier->bAssignment == pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->ubDesiredSquadAssignment || 
01348                                             curr->pPlayerList->pSoldier->ubDesiredSquadAssignment == pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->ubDesiredSquadAssignment )
01349                                     { //This group is the one we want to join (or has the same desire)!
01350                                           pSoldier = pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier;
01351                                           
01352                                           //First, set up flags for the current group to not relocate and walk in sector (they are already there)
01353                                           pPlayer = curr->pPlayerList;
01354                                           while( pPlayer )
01355                                           {
01356                                                 if( pPlayer->pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_IS_TACTICALLY_VALID )
01357                                                 {
01358                                                       pPlayer->pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_IS_TACTICALLY_VALID;
01359                                                 }
01360                                                 pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
01361                                           }
01362                                           while( pGroup->ubGroupSize && curr->ubGroupSize < 6 )
01363                                           { //while there is room in the new group, move one soldier at a time automatically.
01364                                                 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01365                                                       counter++;
01366                                                       if( counter > 100 )
01367                                                       {
01368                                                             AssertMsg( FALSE, L"Aborting infinite loop in merge group code #2. (KM : 1)" );
01369                                                             return FALSE;
01370                                                       }
01371                                                 #endif
01372                                                 if( curr->pPlayerList->pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
01373                                                 {
01374                                                       RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
01375                                                       AddCharacterToSquad( pSoldier, curr->pPlayerList->pSoldier->bAssignment );
01376                                                 }
01377                                                 else
01378                                                 {
01379                                                       // KRIS NEEDS TO FIX THIS BIG TIME!!!
01380                                                       SetSoldierAssignment( pSoldier, curr->pPlayerList->pSoldier->bAssignment, 0, 0, 0 );
01381                                                       RemovePlayerFromGroup( pGroup->ubGroupID, pSoldier );
01382                                                       AddPlayerToGroup( curr->ubGroupID, pSoldier );
01383                                                 }
01384                                           }
01385 
01386                                           //Group successfully merged -- albeit one or more troops only!
01387                                           fSuccess = TRUE;
01388                                     }
01389                               }
01390                         }
01391                   }
01392                   curr = curr->next;
01393             }
01394       }
01395       else if( pGroup->ubGroupSize < 6 )
01396       { //Search for other groups looking to join our group.
01397             while( curr )
01398             {
01399                   if( curr != pGroup && curr->fPlayer && curr->ubGroupSize )
01400                   { //We have a player group with members
01401                         if( curr->pPlayerList->pSoldier->ubNumTraversalsAllowedToMerge )
01402                         { //This group is allowed to merge
01403                               if( curr->ubSectorX == pGroup->ubSectorX && curr->ubSectorY == pGroup->ubSectorY )
01404                               { //This group is in the same sector as us
01405                                     if( curr->pPlayerList->pSoldier->ubDesiredSquadAssignment == pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->bAssignment ||
01406                                             curr->pPlayerList->pSoldier->ubDesiredSquadAssignment == pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->ubDesiredSquadAssignment )
01407                                     { //This group wants to join our group!
01408                                           //First, set up flags for the current group to not relocate and walk in sector (they are already there)
01409                                           pPlayer = curr->pPlayerList;
01410                                           //if( curr->ubSectorX
01411                                           while( pPlayer )
01412                                           {
01413                                                 if( pPlayer->pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_IS_TACTICALLY_VALID )
01414                                                 {
01415                                                       pPlayer->pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_IS_TACTICALLY_VALID;
01416                                                 }
01417                                                 pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
01418                                           }
01419                                           while( curr->ubGroupSize && pGroup->ubGroupSize < 6 )
01420                                           { //while there is room in the new group, move one soldier at a time automatically.
01421                                                 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01422                                                       counter++;
01423                                                       if( counter > 100 )
01424                                                       {
01425                                                             AssertMsg( FALSE, L"Aborting infinite loop in merge group code #3. (KM : 1)" );
01426                                                             return FALSE;
01427                                                       }
01428                                                 #endif
01429                                                 pSoldier = curr->pPlayerList->pSoldier;
01430                                                 if( pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
01431                                                 {
01432                                                       RemoveCharacterFromSquads( pSoldier );
01433                                                       AddCharacterToSquad( pSoldier, pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->bAssignment );
01434                                                 }
01435                                                 else
01436                                                 {
01437                                                       SetSoldierAssignment( pSoldier, curr->pPlayerList->pSoldier->bAssignment, 0, 0, 0 );
01438                                                       RemovePlayerFromGroup( curr->ubGroupID, pSoldier );
01439                                                       AddPlayerToGroup( pGroup->ubGroupID, pSoldier );
01440                                                 }
01441                                           }
01442                                           //Group successfully merged -- albeit one or more troops only!
01443                                           fSuccess = TRUE;
01444                                     }
01445                               }
01446                         }
01447                   }
01448                   curr = curr->next;
01449             }
01450       }
01451       return fSuccess;
01452 #endif
01453 }
01454 
01455 void AwardExperienceForTravelling( GROUP * pGroup )
01456 {
01457       // based on how long movement took, mercs gain a bit of life experience for travelling
01458       PLAYERGROUP *     pPlayerGroup;
01459       SOLDIERTYPE *     pSoldier;
01460       UINT32                        uiPoints;
01461       UINT32                        uiCarriedPercent;
01462 
01463       if ( !pGroup || !pGroup->fPlayer )
01464       {
01465             return;
01466       }
01467 
01468       pPlayerGroup = pGroup->pPlayerList;
01469       while ( pPlayerGroup ) 
01470       {
01471             pSoldier = pPlayerGroup->pSoldier;
01472             if( pSoldier  && !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) && 
01473                         !AM_AN_EPC( pSoldier ) && !(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) )
01474             {
01475                   if ( pSoldier->bLifeMax < 100 )
01476                   {
01477                         // award exp...
01478                         // amount was originally based on getting 100-bLifeMax points for 12 hours of travel (720)
01479                         // but changed to flat rate since StatChange makes roll vs 100-lifemax as well!
01480                         uiPoints = pGroup->uiTraverseTime / (450 / 100 - pSoldier->bLifeMax );
01481                         if ( uiPoints > 0 )
01482                         {
01483                               StatChange( pSoldier, HEALTHAMT, (UINT8) uiPoints, FALSE );
01484                         }
01485                   }
01486 
01487                   if ( pSoldier->bStrength < 100 )
01488                   {
01489                         uiCarriedPercent = CalculateCarriedWeight( pSoldier );
01490                         if ( uiCarriedPercent > 50 )
01491                         {
01492                               uiPoints = pGroup->uiTraverseTime / (450 / (100 - pSoldier->bStrength ) );
01493                               StatChange( pSoldier, STRAMT, ( UINT16 ) ( uiPoints * ( uiCarriedPercent - 50) / 100 ), FALSE );
01494                         }
01495                   }
01496             }
01497             pPlayerGroup = pPlayerGroup->next;
01498       }
01499 
01500 }
01501 
01502 void AddCorpsesToBloodcatLair( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY )
01503 {
01504   ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION         Corpse;
01505   INT16                                       sXPos, sYPos;
01506 
01507 
01508       memset( &Corpse, 0, sizeof( ROTTING_CORPSE_DEFINITION ) );
01509 
01510       // Setup some values!
01511       Corpse.ubBodyType                                     = REGMALE;
01512       Corpse.sHeightAdjustment                  = 0;
01513       Corpse.bVisible                                             =     TRUE;
01514 
01515       SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( Corpse.HeadPal,       "BROWNHEAD" );
01516       SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( Corpse.VestPal,       "YELLOWVEST" );
01517       SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( Corpse.SkinPal,       "PINKSKIN" );
01518       SET_PALETTEREP_ID ( Corpse.PantsPal,  "GREENPANTS" );
01519 
01520 
01521       Corpse.bDirection = (INT8)Random(8);
01522 
01523       // Set time of death
01524   // Make sure they will be rotting!
01525       Corpse.uiTimeOfDeath = GetWorldTotalMin( ) - ( 2 * NUM_SEC_IN_DAY / 60 );
01526       // Set type
01527       Corpse.ubType     = (UINT8)SMERC_JFK;
01528       Corpse.usFlags = ROTTING_CORPSE_FIND_SWEETSPOT_FROM_GRIDNO;
01529 
01530   // 1st gridno
01531       Corpse.sGridNo                                              = 14319;
01532       ConvertGridNoToXY( Corpse.sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
01533       Corpse.dXPos                                                      = (FLOAT)( CenterX( sXPos ) );
01534       Corpse.dYPos                                                      = (FLOAT)( CenterY( sYPos ) );
01535 
01536       //Add the rotting corpse info to the sectors unloaded rotting corpse file
01537       AddRottingCorpseToUnloadedSectorsRottingCorpseFile( sSectorX, sSectorY, 0, &Corpse);
01538 
01539 
01540   // 2nd gridno
01541       Corpse.sGridNo                                              = 9835;
01542       ConvertGridNoToXY( Corpse.sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
01543       Corpse.dXPos                                                      = (FLOAT)( CenterX( sXPos ) );
01544       Corpse.dYPos                                                      = (FLOAT)( CenterY( sYPos ) );
01545 
01546       //Add the rotting corpse info to the sectors unloaded rotting corpse file
01547       AddRottingCorpseToUnloadedSectorsRottingCorpseFile( sSectorX, sSectorY, 0, &Corpse);
01548 
01549 
01550   // 3rd gridno
01551       Corpse.sGridNo                                              = 11262;
01552       ConvertGridNoToXY( Corpse.sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
01553       Corpse.dXPos                                                      = (FLOAT)( CenterX( sXPos ) );
01554       Corpse.dYPos                                                      = (FLOAT)( CenterY( sYPos ) );
01555 
01556       //Add the rotting corpse info to the sectors unloaded rotting corpse file
01557       AddRottingCorpseToUnloadedSectorsRottingCorpseFile( sSectorX, sSectorY, 0, &Corpse);
01558 
01559 }
01560 
01561 
01562 
01563 
01564 //ARRIVALCALLBACK
01565 //...............
01566 //This is called whenever any group arrives in the next sector (player or enemy)
01567 //This function will first check to see if a battle should start, or if they
01568 //aren't at the final destination, they will move to the next sector. 
01569 void GroupArrivedAtSector( UINT8 ubGroupID, BOOLEAN fCheckForBattle, BOOLEAN fNeverLeft )
01570 {
01571       GROUP *pGroup;
01572       INT32 iVehId = -1;
01573       PLAYERGROUP *curr;
01574       UINT8 ubInsertionDirection, ubStrategicInsertionCode;
01575       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
01576       BOOLEAN fExceptionQueue = FALSE;
01577       BOOLEAN fFirstTimeInSector = FALSE;
01578       BOOLEAN fGroupDestroyed = FALSE;
01579       BOOLEAN fVehicleStranded = FALSE;
01580 
01581       // reset
01582       gfWaitingForInput = FALSE;
01583 
01584       // grab the group and see if valid
01585       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
01586 
01587       if( pGroup == NULL )
01588       {
01589             return;
01590       }
01591 
01592       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
01593       {
01594             //Set the fact we have visited the  sector
01595             curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
01596             if( curr )
01597             {
01598                   if( curr->pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
01599                   {
01600                         ResetDeadSquadMemberList( curr->pSoldier->bAssignment );
01601                   }
01602             }
01603 
01604 
01605 
01606             while( curr )
01607             {
01608                   curr->pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= ~SOLDIER_SHOULD_BE_TACTICALLY_VALID;
01609                   curr = curr->next;
01610             }
01611             
01612             if( pGroup->fVehicle )
01613             {
01614                   if( ( iVehId = ( GivenMvtGroupIdFindVehicleId( ubGroupID ) ) ) != -1 )
01615                   {
01616                         if( iVehId != iHelicopterVehicleId )
01617                         {
01618                               if( pGroup->pPlayerList == NULL )
01619                               {
01620                                     // nobody here, better just get out now
01621                                     // with vehicles, arriving empty is probably ok, since passengers might have been killed but vehicle lived.
01622                                     return;
01623                               }
01624                         }
01625                   }
01626             }
01627             else
01628             {
01629                   if( pGroup->pPlayerList == NULL )
01630                   {
01631                         // nobody here, better just get out now
01632                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "Player group %d arrived in sector empty.  KM 0", ubGroupID ) );
01633                         return;
01634                   }
01635             }
01636       }
01637       //Check for exception cases which 
01638       if( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState != NOT_BOXING )
01639       {
01640             if( !pGroup->fPlayer && pGroup->ubNextX == 5 && pGroup->ubNextY == 4 && pGroup->ubSectorZ == 0 )
01641             {
01642                   fExceptionQueue = TRUE;
01643             }
01644       }
01645       //First check if the group arriving is going to queue another battle.
01646       //NOTE:  We can't have more than one battle ongoing at a time.
01647       if( fExceptionQueue || fCheckForBattle && gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector && 
01648                   FindMovementGroupInSector( (UINT8)gWorldSectorX, (UINT8)gWorldSectorY, TRUE ) && 
01649               (pGroup->ubNextX != gWorldSectorX || pGroup->ubNextY != gWorldSectorY || gbWorldSectorZ > 0 ) || 
01650                   AreInMeanwhile() || 
01651                   //KM : Aug 11, 1999 -- Patch fix:  Added additional checks to prevent a 2nd battle in the case
01652                   //     where the player is involved in a potential battle with bloodcats/civilians
01653                   fCheckForBattle && HostileCiviliansPresent() ||
01654                   fCheckForBattle && HostileBloodcatsPresent() 
01655             )
01656       {
01657             //QUEUE BATTLE!
01658             //Delay arrival by a random value ranging from 3-5 minutes, so it doesn't get the player
01659             //too suspicious after it happens to him a few times, which, by the way, is a rare occurrence.
01660             if( AreInMeanwhile() )
01661             {
01662                   pGroup->uiArrivalTime ++; //tack on only 1 minute if we are in a meanwhile scene.  This effectively
01663                                             //prevents any battle from occurring while inside a meanwhile scene.
01664             }
01665             else
01666             {
01667                   pGroup->uiArrivalTime += Random(3) + 3;
01668             }
01669 
01670 
01671             if( !AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->uiArrivalTime, pGroup->ubGroupID ) )
01672                   AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to add movement event." );
01673 
01674             if( pGroup->fPlayer )
01675             {
01676                   if( pGroup->uiArrivalTime - ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE_DELAY > GetWorldTotalMin( ) )
01677                   {
01678                         AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE, pGroup->uiArrivalTime - ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE_DELAY, pGroup->ubGroupID ); 
01679                   }
01680             }
01681 
01682             return;
01683       }
01684 
01685 
01686       //Update the position of the group
01687       pGroup->ubPrevX = pGroup->ubSectorX;
01688       pGroup->ubPrevY = pGroup->ubSectorY;
01689       pGroup->ubSectorX = pGroup->ubNextX;
01690       pGroup->ubSectorY = pGroup->ubNextY;
01691       pGroup->ubNextX = 0;
01692       pGroup->ubNextY = 0;
01693 
01694 
01695       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
01696       {
01697             if( pGroup->ubSectorZ == 0 )
01698             {
01699                   SectorInfo[ SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY ) ].bLastKnownEnemies = NumEnemiesInSector( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
01700             }
01701 
01702             // award life 'experience' for travelling, based on travel time!
01703             if ( !pGroup->fVehicle )
01704             {
01705                   // gotta be walking to get tougher
01706                   AwardExperienceForTravelling( pGroup );
01707             }
01708             else if( !IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( pGroup ) )
01709             {
01710                   SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
01711                   INT32 iVehicleID;
01712                   iVehicleID = GivenMvtGroupIdFindVehicleId( pGroup->ubGroupID );
01713                   AssertMsg( iVehicleID != -1, "GroupArrival for vehicle group.  Invalid iVehicleID. " );
01714 
01715                   pSoldier = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( iVehicleID );
01716                   AssertMsg( pSoldier, "GroupArrival for vehicle group.  Invalid soldier pointer." );
01717 
01718                   SpendVehicleFuel( pSoldier, (INT16)(pGroup->uiTraverseTime*6) );
01719 
01720                   if( !VehicleFuelRemaining( pSoldier ) )
01721                   {
01722                         ReportVehicleOutOfGas( iVehicleID, pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
01723                         //Nuke the group's path, so they don't continue moving.
01724                         ClearMercPathsAndWaypointsForAllInGroup( pGroup );
01725                   }
01726             }
01727       }
01728 
01729       pGroup->uiTraverseTime = 0;
01730       SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, 0 );
01731       pGroup->fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
01732 
01733       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01734       fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
01735 
01736 
01737       // if a player group
01738       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
01739       {
01740             // if this is the last sector along player group's movement path (no more waypoints)
01741             if ( GroupAtFinalDestination( pGroup ) )
01742             {
01743                   // clear their strategic movement (mercpaths and waypoints)
01744                   ClearMercPathsAndWaypointsForAllInGroup( pGroup );
01745             }
01746 
01747             // if on surface
01748             if( pGroup->ubSectorZ == 0 )
01749             {
01750                   // check for discovering secret locations
01751                   INT8 bTownId = GetTownIdForSector( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
01752 
01753                   if( bTownId == TIXA )
01754                         SetTixaAsFound();
01755                   else if( bTownId == ORTA )
01756                         SetOrtaAsFound();
01757                   else if( IsThisSectorASAMSector( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, 0 ) )
01758                         SetSAMSiteAsFound( GetSAMIdFromSector( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, 0 ) );
01759             }
01760 
01761 
01762             if( pGroup->ubSectorX < pGroup->ubPrevX )
01763             {
01764                   ubInsertionDirection = SOUTHWEST;
01765                   ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_EAST;
01766             }
01767             else if( pGroup->ubSectorX > pGroup->ubPrevX )
01768             {
01769                   ubInsertionDirection = NORTHEAST;
01770                   ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_WEST;
01771             }
01772             else if( pGroup->ubSectorY < pGroup->ubPrevY )
01773             {
01774                   ubInsertionDirection = NORTHWEST;
01775                   ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH;
01776             }
01777             else if( pGroup->ubSectorY > pGroup->ubPrevY )
01778             {
01779                   ubInsertionDirection = SOUTHEAST;
01780                   ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
01781             }
01782             else
01783             {
01784                   Assert(0);
01785                   return;
01786             }
01787 
01788 
01789             if( pGroup->fVehicle == FALSE )
01790             {
01791                   // non-vehicle player group
01792 
01793                   curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
01794                   while( curr )
01795                   {
01796                         curr->pSoldier->fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
01797                         curr->pSoldier->sSectorX = pGroup->ubSectorX;
01798                         curr->pSoldier->sSectorY = pGroup->ubSectorY;
01799                         curr->pSoldier->bSectorZ = pGroup->ubSectorZ;
01800                         curr->pSoldier->ubPrevSectorID = (UINT8)SECTOR( pGroup->ubPrevX, pGroup->ubPrevY );
01801                         curr->pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection = ubInsertionDirection;
01802 
01803                         // don't override if a tactical traversal
01804                         if( curr->pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode != INSERTION_CODE_PRIMARY_EDGEINDEX && 
01805                                     curr->pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode != INSERTION_CODE_SECONDARY_EDGEINDEX )
01806                         {
01807                               curr->pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = ubStrategicInsertionCode;
01808                         }
01809                         
01810                         if( curr->pSoldier->pMercPath )
01811                         {
01812                               // remove head from their mapscreen path list
01813                               curr->pSoldier->pMercPath = RemoveHeadFromStrategicPath( curr->pSoldier->pMercPath );
01814                         }
01815 
01816                         // ATE: Alrighty, check if this sector is currently loaded, if so, 
01817                         // add them to the tactical engine!
01818                         if ( pGroup->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY && pGroup->ubSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
01819                         {
01820                               UpdateMercInSector( curr->pSoldier, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
01821                         }
01822                         curr = curr->next;
01823                   }
01824 
01825                   // if there's anybody in the group
01826                   if( pGroup->pPlayerList )
01827                   {
01828                         // don't print any messages when arriving underground (there's no delay involved) or if we never left (cancel)
01829                         if ( GroupAtFinalDestination( pGroup ) && ( pGroup->ubSectorZ == 0 ) && !fNeverLeft )
01830                         {
01831                               // if assigned to a squad
01832                               if( pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
01833                               {
01834                                     // squad
01835                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_ARRIVE ], pAssignmentStrings[ pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->bAssignment ], pMapVertIndex[ pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->sSectorY ], pMapHortIndex[ pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->sSectorX ]);
01836                               }
01837                               else
01838                               {
01839                                     // a loner
01840                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_ARRIVE ], pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->name, pMapVertIndex[ pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->sSectorY  ], pMapHortIndex[ pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->sSectorX  ] );
01841                               }
01842                         }
01843                   }
01844             }
01845             else  // vehicle player group
01846             {
01847                   iVehId = GivenMvtGroupIdFindVehicleId( ubGroupID );
01848                   Assert(iVehId != -1 );
01849 
01850                   if( pVehicleList[ iVehId ].pMercPath  )
01851                   {
01852                         // remove head from vehicle's mapscreen path list
01853                         pVehicleList[ iVehId ].pMercPath = RemoveHeadFromStrategicPath( pVehicleList[ iVehId ].pMercPath );
01854                   }
01855 
01856                   // update vehicle position
01857                   SetVehicleSectorValues( iVehId, pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
01858                   pVehicleList[ iVehId ].fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
01859 
01860                   // update passengers position
01861                   UpdatePositionOfMercsInVehicle( iVehId );
01862 
01863 
01864                   if( iVehId != iHelicopterVehicleId )
01865                   {
01866                         pSoldier = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( iVehId );
01867                         Assert( pSoldier );
01868 
01869                         pSoldier->fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
01870                         pSoldier->sSectorX = pGroup->ubSectorX;
01871                         pSoldier->sSectorY = pGroup->ubSectorY;
01872                         pSoldier->bSectorZ = pGroup->ubSectorZ;
01873                         pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection = ubInsertionDirection;
01874 
01875                         // ATE: Removed, may 21 - sufficient to use insertion direction...
01876                         //pSoldier->bDesiredDirection = ubInsertionDirection;
01877 
01878                         pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = ubStrategicInsertionCode;
01879 
01880                         // if this sector is currently loaded
01881                         if ( pGroup->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY && pGroup->ubSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
01882                         {
01883                               // add vehicle to the tactical engine!
01884                               UpdateMercInSector( pSoldier, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
01885                         }
01886 
01887 
01888 
01889                         // set directions of insertion
01890                         curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
01891                         while( curr )
01892                         {
01893                               curr->pSoldier->fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
01894                               curr->pSoldier->sSectorX = pGroup->ubSectorX;
01895                               curr->pSoldier->sSectorY = pGroup->ubSectorY;
01896                               curr->pSoldier->bSectorZ = pGroup->ubSectorZ;
01897                               curr->pSoldier->ubInsertionDirection = ubInsertionDirection;
01898 
01899                               // ATE: Removed, may 21 - sufficient to use insertion direction...
01900                               // curr->pSoldier->bDesiredDirection = ubInsertionDirection;
01901 
01902                               curr->pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = ubStrategicInsertionCode;
01903 
01904                               // if this sector is currently loaded
01905                               if ( pGroup->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY && pGroup->ubSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ )
01906                               {
01907                                     // add passenger to the tactical engine!
01908                                     UpdateMercInSector( curr->pSoldier, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
01909                               }
01910 
01911                               curr = curr->next;
01912                         }
01913                   }
01914                   else
01915                   {
01916                         if( HandleHeliEnteringSector( pVehicleList[ iVehId ].sSectorX, pVehicleList[ iVehId ].sSectorY ) == TRUE )
01917                         {
01918                               // helicopter destroyed
01919                               fGroupDestroyed = TRUE;
01920                         }
01921                   }
01922 
01923 
01924                   if ( !fGroupDestroyed )
01925                   {
01926                         // don't print any messages when arriving underground, there's no delay involved
01927                         if ( GroupAtFinalDestination( pGroup ) && ( pGroup->ubSectorZ == 0 ) && !fNeverLeft )
01928                         {
01929                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_DKRED, MSG_INTERFACE, pMessageStrings[ MSG_ARRIVE ], pVehicleStrings[ pVehicleList[ iVehId ].ubVehicleType ], pMapVertIndex[ pGroup->ubSectorY ], pMapHortIndex[ pGroup->ubSectorX ] );
01930                         }
01931                   }
01932             }
01933 
01934 
01935             if ( !fGroupDestroyed )
01936             {
01937                   // check if sector had been visited previously
01938                   fFirstTimeInSector = !GetSectorFlagStatus( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, pGroup->ubSectorZ, SF_ALREADY_VISITED );
01939 
01940                   // on foot, or in a vehicle other than the chopper
01941                   if ( !pGroup->fVehicle || !IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( pGroup ) )
01942                   {
01943 
01944         // ATE: Add a few corpse to the bloodcat lair...
01945         if ( SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY ) == SEC_I16 && fFirstTimeInSector )
01946         {
01947           AddCorpsesToBloodcatLair( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
01948         }
01949   
01950                         // mark the sector as visited already
01951                         SetSectorFlag( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, pGroup->ubSectorZ, SF_ALREADY_VISITED );
01952                   }
01953             }
01954 
01955             // update character info
01956             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
01957             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
01958       }
01959 
01960       if ( !fGroupDestroyed )
01961       {
01962             //Determine if a battle should start.
01963             //if a battle does start, or get's delayed, then we will keep the group in memory including
01964             //all waypoints, until after the battle is resolved.  At that point, we will continue the processing.
01965             if( fCheckForBattle && !CheckConditionsForBattle( pGroup ) && !gfWaitingForInput )
01966             {
01967                   GROUP *next;
01968                   HandleNonCombatGroupArrival( pGroup, TRUE, fNeverLeft );
01969 
01970                   if( gubNumGroupsArrivedSimultaneously ) 
01971                   {
01972                         pGroup = gpGroupList;
01973                         while( gubNumGroupsArrivedSimultaneously && pGroup )
01974                         {
01975                               next = pGroup->next;
01976                               if( pGroup->uiFlags & GROUPFLAG_GROUP_ARRIVED_SIMULTANEOUSLY )
01977                               {
01978                                     gubNumGroupsArrivedSimultaneously--;
01979                                     HandleNonCombatGroupArrival( pGroup, FALSE, FALSE );
01980                               }
01981                               pGroup = next;
01982                         }
01983                   }
01984             }
01985             else
01986             { //Handle cases for pre battle conditions
01987                   pGroup->uiFlags = 0;
01988                   if( gubNumAwareBattles )
01989                   { //When the AI is looking for the players, and a battle is initiated, then 
01990                         //decrement the value, otherwise the queen will continue searching to infinity.
01991                         gubNumAwareBattles--;
01992                   }
01993             }
01994       }
01995       gfWaitingForInput = FALSE;
01996 }
01997 
01998 
01999 
02000 
02001 void HandleNonCombatGroupArrival( GROUP *pGroup, BOOLEAN fMainGroup, BOOLEAN fNeverLeft )
02002 {     
02003       // if any mercs are actually in the group
02004 
02005       if( StrategicAILookForAdjacentGroups( pGroup ) )
02006       { //The routine actually just deleted the enemy group (player's don't get deleted), so we are done!
02007             return;
02008       }
02009 
02010       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
02011       {
02012             //The group will always exist after the AI was processed.
02013 
02014             //Determine if the group should rest, change routes, or continue moving.
02015             // if on foot, or in a vehicle other than the helicopter
02016             if( !pGroup->fVehicle || !IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( pGroup ) )
02017             {
02018                   // take control of sector
02019                   SetThisSectorAsPlayerControlled( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, pGroup->ubSectorZ, FALSE );
02020             }
02021 
02022             // if this is the last sector along their movement path (no more waypoints)
02023             if ( GroupAtFinalDestination( pGroup ) )
02024             {
02025                   // if currently selected sector has nobody in it
02026                   if ( PlayerMercsInSector( ( UINT8 ) sSelMapX, ( UINT8 ) sSelMapY, ( UINT8 ) iCurrentMapSectorZ ) == 0 )
02027                   {
02028                         // make this sector strategically selected
02029                         ChangeSelectedMapSector( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, pGroup->ubSectorZ );
02030                   }
02031 
02032                   // if on foot or in a vehicle other than the helicopter (Skyrider speaks for heli movement)
02033                   if ( !pGroup->fVehicle || !IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( pGroup ) )
02034                   {
02035                         StopTimeCompression();
02036 
02037                         // if traversing tactically, or we never left (just canceling), don't do this
02038                         if( !gfTacticalTraversal && !fNeverLeft )
02039                         {
02040                               RandomMercInGroupSaysQuote( pGroup, QUOTE_MERC_REACHED_DESTINATION );
02041                         }
02042                   }
02043             }
02044 
02045 
02046             //MilitiaFollowPlayer( pGroup->ubPrevX, pGroup->ubPrevY, pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
02047 
02048             // look for NPCs to stop for, anyone is too tired to keep going, if all OK rebuild waypoints & continue movement
02049             // NOTE: Only the main group (first group arriving) will stop for NPCs, it's just too much hassle to stop them all
02050             PlayerGroupArrivedSafelyInSector( pGroup, fMainGroup );
02051       }
02052       else
02053       {
02054             if( !pGroup->fDebugGroup )
02055             {
02056                   CalculateNextMoveIntention( pGroup );
02057             }
02058             else
02059             {
02060                   RemovePGroup( pGroup );
02061             }
02062       }
02063       //Clear the non-persistant flags.
02064       pGroup->uiFlags = 0;
02065 }
02066 
02067 
02068 
02069 //Because a battle is about to start, we need to go through the event list and look for other
02070 //groups that may arrive at the same time -- enemies or players, and blindly add them to the sector
02071 //without checking for battle conditions, as it has already determined that a new battle is about to 
02072 //start.
02073 void HandleOtherGroupsArrivingSimultaneously( UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY, UINT8 ubSectorZ )
02074 {
02075       STRATEGICEVENT *pEvent;
02076       UINT32 uiCurrTimeStamp;
02077       GROUP *pGroup;
02078       uiCurrTimeStamp = GetWorldTotalSeconds();
02079       pEvent = gpEventList;
02080       gubNumGroupsArrivedSimultaneously = 0;
02081       while( pEvent && pEvent->uiTimeStamp <= uiCurrTimeStamp )
02082       {
02083             if( pEvent->ubCallbackID == EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL && !(pEvent->ubFlags & SEF_DELETION_PENDING) )
02084             {
02085                   pGroup = GetGroup( (UINT8)pEvent->uiParam );
02086                   Assert( pGroup );
02087                   if( pGroup->ubNextX == ubSectorX && pGroup->ubNextY == ubSectorY && pGroup->ubSectorZ == ubSectorZ )
02088                   {
02089                         if( pGroup->fBetweenSectors )
02090                         {
02091                               GroupArrivedAtSector( (UINT8)pEvent->uiParam, FALSE, FALSE );
02092                               pGroup->uiFlags |= GROUPFLAG_GROUP_ARRIVED_SIMULTANEOUSLY;
02093                               gubNumGroupsArrivedSimultaneously++;
02094                               DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->ubGroupID );
02095                               pEvent = gpEventList;
02096                               continue;
02097                         }
02098                   }
02099             }
02100             pEvent = pEvent->next;
02101       }
02102 }
02103 
02104 //The user has just approved to plan a simultaneous arrival.  So we will syncronize all of the involved
02105 //groups so that they arrive at the same time (which is the time the final group would arrive).  
02106 void PrepareGroupsForSimultaneousArrival()
02107 {
02108       GROUP *pGroup;
02109       UINT32 uiLatestArrivalTime = 0;
02110       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
02111       INT32 iVehId = 0;
02112 
02113       pGroup = gpGroupList;
02114       while( pGroup )
02115       { //For all of the groups that haven't arrived yet, determine which one is going to take the longest.
02116             if( pGroup != gpPendingSimultaneousGroup 
02117                     && pGroup->fPlayer 
02118                         && pGroup->fBetweenSectors 
02119                         && pGroup->ubNextX == gpPendingSimultaneousGroup->ubSectorX 
02120                         && pGroup->ubNextY == gpPendingSimultaneousGroup->ubSectorY &&
02121                         !IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( pGroup ) )
02122             {
02123                   uiLatestArrivalTime = max( pGroup->uiArrivalTime, uiLatestArrivalTime );
02124                   pGroup->uiFlags |= GROUPFLAG_SIMULTANEOUSARRIVAL_APPROVED | GROUPFLAG_MARKER;
02125             }
02126             pGroup = pGroup->next;
02127       }     
02128       //Now, go through the list again, and reset their arrival event to the latest arrival time.
02129       pGroup = gpGroupList;
02130       while( pGroup )
02131       {
02132             if( pGroup->uiFlags & GROUPFLAG_MARKER )
02133             {
02134                   DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->ubGroupID );
02135 
02136                   // NOTE: This can cause the arrival time to be > GetWorldTotalMin() + TraverseTime, so keep that in mind
02137                   // if you have any code that uses these 3 values to figure out how far along its route a group is!
02138                   SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, uiLatestArrivalTime );
02139                   AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->uiArrivalTime, pGroup->ubGroupID );
02140                   
02141                   if( pGroup->fPlayer )
02142                   {
02143                         if( pGroup->uiArrivalTime - ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE_DELAY > GetWorldTotalMin( ) )
02144                         {
02145                               AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE, pGroup->uiArrivalTime - ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE_DELAY, pGroup->ubGroupID ); 
02146                         }
02147                   }
02148 
02149                   DelayEnemyGroupsIfPathsCross( pGroup );
02150 
02151                   pGroup->uiFlags &= ~GROUPFLAG_MARKER;
02152             }
02153             pGroup = pGroup->next;
02154       }
02155       //We still have the first group that has arrived.  Because they are set up to be in the destination
02156       //sector, we will "warp" them back to the last sector, and also setup a new arrival time for them.
02157       pGroup = gpPendingSimultaneousGroup;
02158       pGroup->ubNextX = pGroup->ubSectorX;
02159       pGroup->ubNextY = pGroup->ubSectorY;
02160       pGroup->ubSectorX = pGroup->ubPrevX;
02161       pGroup->ubSectorY = pGroup->ubPrevY;
02162       SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, uiLatestArrivalTime );
02163       pGroup->fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
02164 
02165       if( pGroup->fVehicle )
02166       {
02167             if( ( iVehId = ( GivenMvtGroupIdFindVehicleId( pGroup->ubGroupID ) ) ) != -1 )
02168             {
02169                   pVehicleList[ iVehId ].fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
02170 
02171                   // set up vehicle soldier
02172                   pSoldier = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( iVehId );
02173 
02174                   if( pSoldier )
02175                   {
02176                         pSoldier->fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
02177                   }
02178             }
02179       }
02180 
02181       AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->uiArrivalTime, pGroup->ubGroupID );
02182       
02183       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
02184       {
02185             if( pGroup->uiArrivalTime - ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE_DELAY > GetWorldTotalMin( ) )
02186             {
02187                   AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE, pGroup->uiArrivalTime - ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE_DELAY, pGroup->ubGroupID ); 
02188             }
02189       }
02190       DelayEnemyGroupsIfPathsCross( pGroup );
02191 }
02192 
02193 //See if there are other groups OTW.  If so, and if we haven't asked the user yet to plan
02194 //a simultaneous attack, do so now, and readjust the groups accordingly.  If it is possible
02195 //to do so, then we will set up the gui, and postpone the prebattle interface.
02196 BOOLEAN PossibleToCoordinateSimultaneousGroupArrivals( GROUP *pFirstGroup )
02197 {
02198       GROUP *pGroup;
02199       UINT8 ubNumNearbyGroups = 0;
02200 
02201       //If the user has already been asked, then don't ask the question again!
02202       if( pFirstGroup->uiFlags & (GROUPFLAG_SIMULTANEOUSARRIVAL_APPROVED | GROUPFLAG_SIMULTANEOUSARRIVAL_CHECKED) || 
02203             IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( pFirstGroup ) )
02204       {
02205             return FALSE;
02206       }
02207 
02208       //We can't coordinate simultaneous attacks on a sector without any stationary forces!  Otherwise, it
02209       //is possible that they will be gone when you finally arrive.
02210       //if( !NumStationaryEnemiesInSector( pFirstGroup->ubSectorX, pFirstGroup->ubSectorY ) )
02211       //    return FALSE;
02212 
02213       //Count the number of groups that are scheduled to arrive in the same sector and are currently
02214       //adjacent to the sector in question.
02215       pGroup = gpGroupList;
02216       while( pGroup )
02217       {
02218             if( pGroup != pFirstGroup && pGroup->fPlayer && pGroup->fBetweenSectors && 
02219                     pGroup->ubNextX == pFirstGroup->ubSectorX && pGroup->ubNextY == pFirstGroup->ubSectorY &&
02220                         !(pGroup->uiFlags & GROUPFLAG_SIMULTANEOUSARRIVAL_CHECKED) &&
02221                         !IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( pGroup ) )
02222             {
02223                   pGroup->uiFlags |= GROUPFLAG_SIMULTANEOUSARRIVAL_CHECKED;
02224                   ubNumNearbyGroups++;
02225             }
02226             pGroup = pGroup->next;
02227       }
02228 
02229       if( ubNumNearbyGroups )
02230       { //postpone the battle until the user answers the dialog.
02231             UINT16 str[255];
02232             UINT16 *pStr, *pEnemyType;
02233             InterruptTime();
02234             PauseGame();
02235             LockPauseState( 13 );
02236             gpPendingSimultaneousGroup = pFirstGroup;
02237             //Build the string
02238             if( ubNumNearbyGroups == 1 )
02239             {
02240                   pStr = gpStrategicString[ STR_DETECTED_SINGULAR ];
02241             }
02242             else
02243             {
02244                   pStr = gpStrategicString[ STR_DETECTED_PLURAL ];
02245             }
02246             if( gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE )
02247             {
02248                   pEnemyType = gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_BLOODCATS ];
02249             }
02250             else
02251             {
02252                   pEnemyType = gpStrategicString[ STR_PB_ENEMIES ];
02253             }
02254             //header, sector, singular/plural str, confirmation string.
02255             //Ex:  Enemies have been detected in sector J9 and another squad is 
02256             //     about to arrive.  Do you wish to coordinate a simultaneous arrival?
02257             swprintf( str, pStr, 
02258                   pEnemyType, //Enemy type (Enemies or bloodcats)
02259                   'A' + gpPendingSimultaneousGroup->ubSectorY - 1, gpPendingSimultaneousGroup->ubSectorX ); //Sector location
02260             wcscat( str, L"  " );
02261             wcscat( str, gpStrategicString[ STR_COORDINATE ] );
02262             //Setup the dialog
02263 
02264             //Kris August 03, 1999 Bug fix:  Changed 1st line to 2nd line to fix game breaking if this dialog came up while in tactical.
02265             //                               It would kick you to mapscreen, where things would break...
02266             //DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, str, MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, PlanSimultaneousGroupArrivalCallback );
02267             DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)str, guiCurrentScreen, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, PlanSimultaneousGroupArrivalCallback );
02268             
02269             gfWaitingForInput = TRUE;
02270             return TRUE;
02271       }
02272       return FALSE;
02273 }
02274 
02275 void PlanSimultaneousGroupArrivalCallback( UINT8 bMessageValue )
02276 {
02277   if( bMessageValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
02278       {
02279             PrepareGroupsForSimultaneousArrival();
02280       }
02281       else
02282       {
02283             PrepareForPreBattleInterface( gpPendingSimultaneousGroup, gpPendingSimultaneousGroup );
02284       }
02285       UnLockPauseState();
02286       UnPauseGame();
02287 }
02288 
02289 void DelayEnemyGroupsIfPathsCross( GROUP *pPlayerGroup )
02290 {
02291       GROUP *pGroup;
02292       pGroup = gpGroupList;
02293       while( pGroup )
02294       {
02295             if( !pGroup->fPlayer )
02296             { //then check to see if this group will arrive in next sector before the player group.
02297                   if( pGroup->uiArrivalTime < pPlayerGroup->uiArrivalTime )
02298                   { //check to see if enemy group will cross paths with player group.
02299                         if( pGroup->ubNextX == pPlayerGroup->ubSectorX &&
02300                                     pGroup->ubNextY == pPlayerGroup->ubSectorY &&
02301                                     pGroup->ubSectorX == pPlayerGroup->ubNextX &&
02302                                     pGroup->ubSectorY == pPlayerGroup->ubNextY )
02303                         { //Okay, the enemy group will cross paths with the player, so find and delete the arrival event
02304                               //and repost it in the future (like a minute or so after the player arrives)
02305                               DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->ubGroupID );
02306 
02307                               // NOTE: This can cause the arrival time to be > GetWorldTotalMin() + TraverseTime, so keep that in mind
02308                               // if you have any code that uses these 3 values to figure out how far along its route a group is!
02309                               SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, pPlayerGroup->uiArrivalTime + 1 + Random( 10 ) );
02310                               if( !AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->uiArrivalTime, pGroup->ubGroupID ) )
02311                                     AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to add movement event." );
02312                         }
02313                   }
02314             }
02315             pGroup = pGroup->next;
02316       }
02317 }
02318 
02319 
02320 void InitiateGroupMovementToNextSector( GROUP *pGroup )
02321 {
02322       INT32 dx, dy;
02323       INT32 i;
02324       UINT8 ubDirection;
02325       UINT8 ubSector;
02326       WAYPOINT *wp;
02327       INT32 iVehId = -1;
02328       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
02329       UINT32 uiSleepMinutes = 0;
02330 
02331 
02332       Assert( pGroup );
02333       i = pGroup->ubNextWaypointID;
02334       wp = pGroup->pWaypoints;
02335       while( i-- )
02336       { //Traverse through the waypoint list to the next waypoint ID
02337             Assert( wp );
02338             wp = wp->next;
02339       }
02340       Assert( wp );
02341       //We now have the correct waypoint.
02342       //Analyse the group and determine which direction it will move from the current sector.
02343       dx = wp->x - pGroup->ubSectorX;
02344       dy = wp->y - pGroup->ubSectorY;
02345       if( dx && dy )
02346       { //Can't move diagonally!
02347             AssertMsg( 0, String("Attempting to move to waypoint in a diagonal direction from sector %d,%d to sector %d,%d", 
02348                   pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, wp->x, wp->y ) );
02349       }
02350       if( !dx && !dy ) //Can't move to position currently at!
02351             AssertMsg( 0, String("Attempting to move to waypoint %d, %d that you are already at!", wp->x, wp->y ) ); 
02352       //Clip dx/dy value so that the move is for only one sector.
02353       if( dx >= 1 )
02354       {
02355             ubDirection = EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02356             dx = 1;
02357       }
02358       else if( dy >= 1 )
02359       {
02360             ubDirection = SOUTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02361             dy = 1;
02362       }
02363       else if( dx <= -1 )
02364       {
02365             ubDirection = WEST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02366             dx = -1;
02367       }
02368       else if( dy <= -1 )
02369       {
02370             ubDirection = NORTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02371             dy = -1;
02372       }
02373       else
02374       {
02375             Assert( 0 );
02376             return;
02377       }
02378       //All conditions for moving to the next waypoint are now good.
02379       pGroup->ubNextX = (UINT8)( dx + pGroup->ubSectorX );
02380       pGroup->ubNextY = (UINT8)( dy + pGroup->ubSectorY );
02381       //Calc time to get to next waypoint...
02382       ubSector = (UINT8)SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
02383       if( !pGroup->ubSectorZ )
02384       {
02385             BOOLEAN fCalcRegularTime = TRUE;
02386             if( !pGroup->fPlayer )
02387             { //Determine if the enemy group is "sleeping".  If so, then simply delay their arrival time by the amount of time
02388                   //they are going to be sleeping for.
02389                   if( GetWorldHour() >= 21 || GetWorldHour() <= 4 )
02390                   { //It is definitely night time.
02391                         if( Chance( 67 ) )
02392                         { //2 in 3 chance of going to sleep.
02393                               pGroup->uiTraverseTime = GetSectorMvtTimeForGroup( ubSector, ubDirection, pGroup );
02394                               uiSleepMinutes = 360 + Random( 121 ); //6-8 hours sleep 
02395                               fCalcRegularTime = FALSE;
02396                         }
02397                   }
02398             }
02399             if( fCalcRegularTime )
02400             {
02401                   pGroup->uiTraverseTime = GetSectorMvtTimeForGroup( ubSector, ubDirection, pGroup );
02402             }
02403       }
02404       else
02405       {
02406             pGroup->uiTraverseTime = 1;
02407       }
02408 
02409       if( pGroup->uiTraverseTime == 0xffffffff )
02410       {
02411             AssertMsg( 0, String("Group %d (%s) attempting illegal move from %c%d to %c%d (%s).", 
02412                         pGroup->ubGroupID, ( pGroup->fPlayer ) ? "Player" : "AI",
02413                         pGroup->ubSectorY+'A', pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubNextY+'A', pGroup->ubNextX,
02414                         gszTerrain[SectorInfo[ubSector].ubTraversability[ubDirection]] ) );
02415       }
02416 
02417       // add sleep, if any
02418       pGroup->uiTraverseTime += uiSleepMinutes;
02419 
02420       if( gfTacticalTraversal && gpTacticalTraversalGroup == pGroup )
02421       {
02422             if( gfUndergroundTacticalTraversal )
02423             {     //underground movement between sectors takes 1 minute.
02424                   pGroup->uiTraverseTime = 1;
02425             }
02426             else
02427             { //strategic movement between town sectors takes 5 minutes.
02428                   pGroup->uiTraverseTime = 5;
02429             }
02430       }
02431 
02432       // if group isn't already between sectors
02433       if ( !pGroup->fBetweenSectors )
02434       {
02435             // put group between sectors
02436             pGroup->fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
02437             // and set it's arrival time
02438             SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, GetWorldTotalMin() + pGroup->uiTraverseTime );
02439       }
02440       // NOTE: if the group is already between sectors, DON'T MESS WITH ITS ARRIVAL TIME!  THAT'S NOT OUR JOB HERE!!!
02441 
02442 
02443       // special override for AI patrol initialization only
02444       if( gfRandomizingPatrolGroup )
02445       { //We're initializing the patrol group, so randomize the enemy groups to have extremely quick and varying
02446             //arrival times so that their initial positions aren't easily determined.
02447             pGroup->uiTraverseTime = 1 + Random( pGroup->uiTraverseTime - 1 );
02448             SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, GetWorldTotalMin() + pGroup->uiTraverseTime );
02449       }
02450 
02451 
02452       if( pGroup->fVehicle == TRUE )
02453       {
02454             // vehicle, set fact it is between sectors too
02455             if( ( iVehId = ( GivenMvtGroupIdFindVehicleId( pGroup->ubGroupID ) ) ) != -1 )
02456             {
02457                   pVehicleList[ iVehId ].fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
02458                   pSoldier = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( iVehId );
02459 
02460                   if( pSoldier )
02461                   {
02462                         pSoldier->fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
02463 
02464                         // OK, Remove the guy from tactical engine!
02465                         RemoveSoldierFromTacticalSector( pSoldier, TRUE );
02466 
02467                   }
02468             }
02469       }
02470 
02471       //Post the event!
02472       if( !AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->uiArrivalTime, pGroup->ubGroupID ) )
02473             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to add movement event." );
02474 
02475       //For the case of player groups, we need to update the information of the soldiers.
02476       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
02477       {
02478             PLAYERGROUP *curr;
02479 
02480             if( pGroup->uiArrivalTime - ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE_DELAY > GetWorldTotalMin( ) )
02481             {
02482                   AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE, pGroup->uiArrivalTime - ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE_DELAY, pGroup->ubGroupID ); 
02483             }
02484 
02485             curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
02486             while( curr )
02487             {
02488                   curr->pSoldier->fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
02489 
02490                   // OK, Remove the guy from tactical engine!
02491                   RemoveSoldierFromTacticalSector( curr->pSoldier, TRUE );
02492 
02493                   curr = curr->next;
02494             }
02495             CheckAndHandleUnloadingOfCurrentWorld();
02496 
02497             //If an enemy group will be crossing paths with the player group, delay the enemy group's arrival time so that
02498             //the player will always encounter that group.
02499             if( !pGroup->ubSectorZ )
02500             {
02501                   DelayEnemyGroupsIfPathsCross( pGroup );
02502             }
02503       }
02504 }
02505 
02506 void RemoveGroupWaypoints( UINT8 ubGroupID )
02507 {
02508       GROUP *pGroup;
02509       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
02510       Assert( pGroup );
02511       RemovePGroupWaypoints( pGroup );
02512 }
02513 
02514 void RemovePGroupWaypoints( GROUP *pGroup )
02515 {
02516       WAYPOINT* wp;
02517       //if there aren't any waypoints to delete, then return.  This also avoids setting
02518       //the fWaypointsCancelled flag.
02519       if( !pGroup->pWaypoints )
02520             return;
02521       //remove all of the waypoints.
02522       while( pGroup->pWaypoints )
02523       {
02524             wp = pGroup->pWaypoints;
02525             pGroup->pWaypoints = pGroup->pWaypoints->next;
02526             MemFree( wp );
02527       }
02528       pGroup->ubNextWaypointID = 0;
02529       pGroup->pWaypoints = NULL;
02530 
02531       //By setting this flag, it acknowledges the possibility that the group is currently between sectors,
02532       //and will continue moving until it reaches the next sector.  If the user decides to change directions,
02533       //during this process, the arrival event must be modified to send the group back.
02534       //pGroup->fWaypointsCancelled = TRUE;  
02535 }
02536 
02537 
02538 
02539 // set groups waypoints as cancelled
02540 void SetWayPointsAsCanceled( UINT8 ubGroupID )
02541 {
02542       GROUP *pGroup;
02543       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
02544       Assert( pGroup );
02545 
02546       //pGroup -> fWaypointsCancelled = TRUE;
02547 
02548       return;
02549 }
02550 
02551 
02552 // set this groups previous sector values
02553 void SetGroupPrevSectors( UINT8 ubGroupID, UINT8 ubX, UINT8 ubY )
02554 {
02555       GROUP *pGroup;
02556       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
02557       Assert( pGroup );
02558 
02559       // since we have a group, set prev sector's x and y
02560       pGroup -> ubPrevX = ubX;
02561       pGroup -> ubPrevY = ubY;
02562 
02563 }
