02565 
02566 void RemoveGroup( UINT8 ubGroupID )
02567 {
02568       GROUP *pGroup;
02569       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
02570 
02571       if ( ubGroupID == 51 )
02572       {
02573             int i = 0;
02574       }
02575 
02576       Assert( pGroup );
02577       RemovePGroup( pGroup );
02578 }
02579 
02580 BOOLEAN gfRemovingAllGroups = FALSE;
02581 
02582 void RemovePGroup( GROUP *pGroup )
02583 {
02584       UINT32 bit, index, mask;
02585 
02586       if( pGroup->fPersistant && !gfRemovingAllGroups )
02587       {
02588             CancelEmptyPersistentGroupMovement( pGroup );
02589             return;
02590             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( L"Strategic Info Warning:  Attempting to delete a persistant group.", MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
02591       }
02592       //if removing head, then advance head first.
02593       if( pGroup == gpGroupList )
02594             gpGroupList = gpGroupList->next;
02595       else 
02596       { //detach this node from the list.
02597             GROUP *curr;
02598             curr = gpGroupList;
02599             while( curr->next && curr->next != pGroup )
02600                   curr = curr->next;
02601             AssertMsg( curr->next == pGroup, "Trying to remove a strategic group that isn't in the list!");
02602             curr->next = pGroup->next;
02603       }
02604 
02605 
02606       //Remove the waypoints.
02607       RemovePGroupWaypoints( pGroup );
02608 
02609       //Remove the arrival event if applicable.
02610       DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->ubGroupID );
02611 
02612       //Determine what type of group we have (because it requires different methods)
02613       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
02614       { //Remove player group
02615             PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
02616             while( pGroup->pPlayerList )
02617             {
02618                   pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
02619                   pGroup->pPlayerList = pGroup->pPlayerList->next;
02620                   MemFree( pPlayer );
02621             }
02622       }
02623       else
02624       {
02625             RemoveGroupFromStrategicAILists( pGroup->ubGroupID );
02626             MemFree( pGroup->pEnemyGroup );
02627       }
02628             
02629       //clear the unique group ID
02630       index = pGroup->ubGroupID / 32;
02631       bit = pGroup->ubGroupID % 32;
02632       mask = 1 << bit;
02633 
02634       if( !(uniqueIDMask[ index ] & mask) )
02635       {
02636             mask = mask;
02637       }
02638       
02639       uniqueIDMask[ index ] -= mask;
02640 
02641       MemFree( pGroup );
02642       pGroup = NULL;
02643 }
02644 
02645 void RemoveAllGroups()
02646 {
02647       gfRemovingAllGroups = TRUE;
02648       while( gpGroupList )
02649       {
02650             RemovePGroup( gpGroupList );
02651       }
02652       gfRemovingAllGroups = FALSE;
02653 }
02654 
02655 void SetGroupSectorValue( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT16 sSectorZ, UINT8 ubGroupID )
02656 {
02657       GROUP *pGroup;
02658       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
02659       
02660       // get the group
02661       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
02662       
02663       // make sure it is valid
02664       Assert( pGroup );
02665 
02666       //Remove waypoints
02667       RemovePGroupWaypoints( pGroup );
02668 
02669       // set sector x and y to passed values
02670       pGroup->ubSectorX = pGroup->ubNextX = ( UINT8 ) sSectorX;
02671       pGroup->ubSectorY = pGroup->ubNextY = ( UINT8 ) sSectorY;
02672       pGroup->ubSectorZ = ( UINT8 ) sSectorZ;
02673       pGroup->fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
02674 
02675       // set next sectors same as current
02676       pGroup->ubOriginalSector = (UINT8)SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
02677       DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->ubGroupID );
02678 
02679       // set all of the mercs in the group so that they are in the new sector too.
02680       pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
02681       while( pPlayer )
02682       {
02683             pPlayer->pSoldier->sSectorX = sSectorX;
02684             pPlayer->pSoldier->sSectorY = sSectorY;
02685             pPlayer->pSoldier->bSectorZ = (UINT8)sSectorZ;
02686             pPlayer->pSoldier->fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
02687             pPlayer->pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= ~SOLDIER_SHOULD_BE_TACTICALLY_VALID;
02688             pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
02689       }
02690 
02691       CheckAndHandleUnloadingOfCurrentWorld();
02692 }
02693 
02694 void SetEnemyGroupSector( GROUP *pGroup, UINT8 ubSectorID )
02695 {
02696       // make sure it is valid
02697       Assert( pGroup );
02698       DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->ubGroupID );
02699 
02700       //Remove waypoints
02701       if( !gfRandomizingPatrolGroup )
02702       {
02703             RemovePGroupWaypoints( pGroup );
02704       }
02705 
02706       // set sector x and y to passed values
02707       pGroup->ubSectorX = pGroup->ubNextX = (UINT8)SECTORX( ubSectorID );
02708       pGroup->ubSectorY = pGroup->ubNextY = (UINT8)SECTORY( ubSectorID );
02709       pGroup->ubSectorZ = 0;
02710       pGroup->fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
02711       //pGroup->fWaypointsCancelled = FALSE;
02712 }
02713 
02714 
02715 void SetGroupNextSectorValue( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, UINT8 ubGroupID )
02716 {
02717       GROUP *pGroup;
02718       
02719       // get the group
02720   pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
02721       
02722       // make sure it is valid
02723       Assert( pGroup );
02724 
02725       //Remove waypoints
02726       RemovePGroupWaypoints( pGroup );
02727 
02728       // set sector x and y to passed values
02729       pGroup->ubNextX = ( UINT8 ) sSectorX;
02730       pGroup->ubNextY = ( UINT8 ) sSectorY;
02731       pGroup->fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
02732 
02733       // set next sectors same as current
02734       pGroup->ubOriginalSector = (UINT8)SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
02735 }
02736 
02737 
02738 // get eta of the group with this id
02739 INT32 CalculateTravelTimeOfGroupId( UINT8 ubId )
02740 {
02741       GROUP *pGroup;
02742       
02743       // get the group
02744       pGroup = GetGroup( ubId );
02745       
02746       if( pGroup == NULL )
02747       {
02748             return( 0 );
02749       } 
02750 
02751       return( CalculateTravelTimeOfGroup( pGroup ) );
02752 }
02753 
02754 INT32 CalculateTravelTimeOfGroup( GROUP *pGroup )
02755 {
02756       INT32 iDelta;
02757       UINT32 uiEtaTime = 0;
02758       WAYPOINT *pNode = NULL;
02759       WAYPOINT pCurrent, pDest;
02760       INT8 ubCurrentSector = 0;
02761 
02762 
02763       // check if valid group
02764       if( pGroup == NULL )
02765       {
02766             // return current time
02767             return( uiEtaTime );
02768       }
02769 
02770       // set up next node
02771       pNode = pGroup-> pWaypoints;
02772 
02773       // now get the delta in current sector and next sector
02774       iDelta = ( INT32 )( SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY ) - SECTOR( pGroup->ubNextX, pGroup->ubNextY ) );
02775 
02776       if( iDelta == 0 )
02777       {
02778             // not going anywhere...return current time
02779             return( uiEtaTime );
02780       }
02781 
02782 
02783       // if already on the road
02784       if ( pGroup->fBetweenSectors )
02785       {
02786             // to get travel time to the first sector, use the arrival time, this way it accounts for delays due to simul. arrival
02787             if ( pGroup->uiArrivalTime >= GetWorldTotalMin( ) )
02788             {
02789                   uiEtaTime += ( pGroup->uiArrivalTime - GetWorldTotalMin( ) );
02790             }
02791 
02792             // first waypoint is NEXT sector
02793             pCurrent.x = pGroup->ubNextX;
02794             pCurrent.y = pGroup->ubNextY;
02795       }
02796       else
02797       {
02798             // first waypoint is CURRENT sector
02799             pCurrent.x = pGroup->ubSectorX;
02800             pCurrent.y = pGroup->ubSectorY;
02801       }
02802 
02803       while( pNode )
02804       {
02805             pDest.x = pNode->x;
02806             pDest.y = pNode->y;
02807 
02808             // update eta time by the path between these 2 waypts
02809             uiEtaTime += FindTravelTimeBetweenWaypoints( &pCurrent, &pDest, pGroup );
02810 
02811             pCurrent.x = pNode->x;
02812             pCurrent.y = pNode->y;
02813 
02814             // next waypt
02815             pNode = pNode->next;
02816       }
02817 
02818       return( uiEtaTime );
02819 }
02820 
02821 INT32 FindTravelTimeBetweenWaypoints( WAYPOINT * pSource, WAYPOINT * pDest,  GROUP *pGroup )
02822 {
02823       UINT8 ubStart=0, ubEnd = 0;
02824       INT32 iDelta = 0;
02825       INT32 iCurrentCostInTime = 0;
02826       UINT8 ubCurrentSector = 0;
02827       UINT8 ubDirection;
02828       INT32 iThisCostInTime;
02829 
02830 
02831       // find travel time between waypoints
02832       if( !pSource || !pDest )
02833       {
02834             // no change
02835             return( iCurrentCostInTime );
02836       }
02837 
02838       // get start and end setor values
02839       ubStart = SECTOR( pSource->x, pSource->y );
02840       ubEnd   = SECTOR( pDest->x,   pDest->y );
02841 
02842       // are we in fact moving?
02843       if( ubStart == ubEnd )
02844       {
02845             // no
02846             return( iCurrentCostInTime );
02847       }
02848 
02849       iDelta = ( INT32 )( ubEnd - ubStart );
02850 
02851       // which direction are we moving?
02852       if( iDelta > 0 )
02853       {
02854             if( iDelta % ( SOUTH_MOVE - 2 ) == 0 )
02855             {
02856                   iDelta = ( SOUTH_MOVE - 2 ) ;
02857                   ubDirection = SOUTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02858             }
02859             else
02860             {
02861                   iDelta = EAST_MOVE;
02862                   ubDirection = EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02863             }
02864       }
02865       else
02866       {
02867             if( iDelta % ( NORTH_MOVE + 2 ) == 0 )
02868             {
02869                   iDelta = ( NORTH_MOVE + 2 );
02870                   ubDirection = NORTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02871             }
02872             else
02873             {
02874                   iDelta = WEST_MOVE;
02875                   ubDirection = WEST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
02876             }
02877       }
02878 
02879       for( ubCurrentSector = ubStart; ubCurrentSector != ubEnd; ubCurrentSector += ( INT8 ) iDelta )
02880       {
02881             // find diff between current and next
02882             iThisCostInTime = GetSectorMvtTimeForGroup( ubCurrentSector, ubDirection, pGroup );
02883 
02884             if( iThisCostInTime == 0xffffffff )
02885             {
02886                   AssertMsg( 0, String("Group %d (%s) attempting illegal move from sector %d, dir %d (%s).", 
02887                               pGroup->ubGroupID, ( pGroup->fPlayer ) ? "Player" : "AI",
02888                               ubCurrentSector, ubDirection,
02889                               gszTerrain[SectorInfo[ubCurrentSector].ubTraversability[ubDirection]] ) );
02890             }
02891 
02892             // accumulate it
02893             iCurrentCostInTime += iThisCostInTime;
02894       }
02895 
02896       return( iCurrentCostInTime );
02897 }
02898 
02899 
02900 
02901 #define FOOT_TRAVEL_TIME            89
02902 #define CAR_TRAVEL_TIME             30
02903 #define TRUCK_TRAVEL_TIME           32
02904 #define TRACKED_TRAVEL_TIME   46
02905 #define AIR_TRAVEL_TIME             10
02906 
02907 //CHANGES:  ubDirection contains the strategic move value, not the delta value.  
02908 INT32 GetSectorMvtTimeForGroup( UINT8 ubSector, UINT8 ubDirection, GROUP *pGroup )
02909 {
02910       INT32 iTraverseTime;
02911       INT32 iBestTraverseTime = 1000000;
02912       INT32 iEncumbrance, iHighestEncumbrance = 0;
02913       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02914       PLAYERGROUP *curr;
02915       BOOLEAN fFoot, fCar, fTruck, fTracked, fAir;
02916       UINT8 ubTraverseType;
02917       UINT8 ubTraverseMod;
02918 
02919       
02920       // THIS FUNCTION WAS WRITTEN TO HANDLE MOVEMENT TYPES WHERE MORE THAN ONE TRANSPORTAION TYPE IS AVAILABLE.
02921 
02922       //Determine the group's method(s) of tranportation.  If more than one,
02923       //we will always use the highest time.
02924       fFoot = (UINT8)(pGroup->ubTransportationMask & FOOT);
02925       fCar = (UINT8)(pGroup->ubTransportationMask & CAR);
02926       fTruck = (UINT8)(pGroup->ubTransportationMask & TRUCK);
02927       fTracked = (UINT8)(pGroup->ubTransportationMask & TRACKED);
02928       fAir = (UINT8)(pGroup->ubTransportationMask & AIR);
02929 
02930       ubTraverseType = SectorInfo[ ubSector ].ubTraversability[ ubDirection ];
02931 
02932       if( ubTraverseType == EDGEOFWORLD )
02933             return 0xffffffff; //can't travel here!
02934 
02935       // ARM: Made air-only travel take its normal time per sector even through towns.  Because Skyrider charges by the sector,
02936       // not by flying time, it's annoying when his default route detours through a town to save time, but costs extra money.
02937       // This isn't exactly unrealistic, since the chopper shouldn't be faster flying over a town anyway...  Not that other
02938       // kinds of travel should be either - but the towns represents a kind of warping of our space-time scale as it is...
02939       if( ( ubTraverseType == TOWN ) && ( pGroup->ubTransportationMask != AIR ) )
02940             return 5; //very fast, and vehicle types don't matter.
02941 
02942       if( fFoot )
02943       {
02944             switch( ubTraverseType )
02945             {
02946                   case ROAD:                                ubTraverseMod = 100;break;
02947                   case PLAINS:                              ubTraverseMod = 85; break;
02948                   case SAND:                                ubTraverseMod = 50;     break;
02949                   case SPARSE:                              ubTraverseMod = 70;     break;
02950                   case DENSE:                               ubTraverseMod = 60;     break;
02951                   case SWAMP:                               ubTraverseMod = 35;     break;
02952                   case WATER:                               ubTraverseMod = 25;     break;
02953                   case HILLS:                               ubTraverseMod = 50;     break;
02954                   case GROUNDBARRIER:           ubTraverseMod = 0;      break;
02955                   case NS_RIVER:                      ubTraverseMod = 25;     break;
02956                   case EW_RIVER:                      ubTraverseMod = 25;     break;
02957                   default:
02958                         Assert( 0 );
02959                         return 0xffffffff;
02960             }
02961             if( ubTraverseMod == 0 )
02962                   return 0xffffffff; //Group can't traverse here.
02963             iTraverseTime  = FOOT_TRAVEL_TIME * 100 / ubTraverseMod;
02964             if( iTraverseTime < iBestTraverseTime )
02965                   iBestTraverseTime = iTraverseTime;
02966 
02967             if( pGroup->fPlayer )
02968             {
02969                   curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
02970                   while( curr )
02971                   {
02972                         pSoldier = curr->pSoldier;
02973                         if( pSoldier->bAssignment != VEHICLE )
02974                         { //Soldier is on foot and travelling.  Factor encumbrance into movement rate.
02975                               iEncumbrance = CalculateCarriedWeight( pSoldier );
02976                               if( iEncumbrance > iHighestEncumbrance )
02977                               {
02978                                     iHighestEncumbrance = iEncumbrance;
02979                               }
02980                         }
02981                         curr = curr->next;
02982                   }
02983                   if( iHighestEncumbrance > 100 )
02984                   {
02985                         iBestTraverseTime = iBestTraverseTime * iHighestEncumbrance / 100;
02986                   }
02987             }
02988       }
02989       if( fCar )
02990       {
02991             switch( ubTraverseType )
02992             {
02993                   case ROAD:                          ubTraverseMod = 100;    break;
02994                   default:                                  ubTraverseMod = 0;            break;
02995             }
02996             if( ubTraverseMod == 0 )
02997                   return 0xffffffff; //Group can't traverse here.
02998             iTraverseTime  = CAR_TRAVEL_TIME * 100 / ubTraverseMod;
02999             if( iTraverseTime < iBestTraverseTime )
03000                   iBestTraverseTime = iTraverseTime;
03001       }
03002       if( fTruck )
03003       {
03004             switch( ubTraverseType )
03005             {
03006                   case ROAD:                          ubTraverseMod = 100;    break;
03007                   case PLAINS:                        ubTraverseMod = 75;     break;
03008                   case SPARSE:                        ubTraverseMod = 60;     break;
03009                   case HILLS:                         ubTraverseMod = 50;     break;
03010                   default:                                  ubTraverseMod = 0;      break;
03011             }
03012             if( ubTraverseMod == 0 )
03013                   return 0xffffffff; //Group can't traverse here.
03014             iTraverseTime  = TRUCK_TRAVEL_TIME * 100 / ubTraverseMod;
03015             if( iTraverseTime < iBestTraverseTime )
03016                   iBestTraverseTime = iTraverseTime;
03017       }
03018       if( fTracked )
03019       {
03020             switch( ubTraverseType )
03021             {
03022                   case ROAD:                          ubTraverseMod = 100;    break;
03023                   case PLAINS:                        ubTraverseMod = 100;    break;
03024                   case SAND:                          ubTraverseMod = 70;           break;
03025                   case SPARSE:                        ubTraverseMod = 60;           break;
03026                   case HILLS:                         ubTraverseMod = 60;           break;
03027                   case NS_RIVER:                ubTraverseMod = 20;           break;
03028                   case EW_RIVER:                ubTraverseMod = 20;           break;
03029                   case WATER:                         ubTraverseMod = 10;           break;
03030                   default:                                  ubTraverseMod = 0;            break;
03031             }
03032             if( ubTraverseMod == 0 )
03033                   return 0xffffffff; //Group can't traverse here.
03034             iTraverseTime  = TRACKED_TRAVEL_TIME * 100 / ubTraverseMod;
03035             if( iTraverseTime < iBestTraverseTime )
03036                   iBestTraverseTime = iTraverseTime;
03037       }
03038       if( fAir )
03039       {
03040             iTraverseTime  = AIR_TRAVEL_TIME;
03041             if( iTraverseTime < iBestTraverseTime )
03042                   iBestTraverseTime = iTraverseTime;
03043       }
03044       return iBestTraverseTime;
03045 }
03046 
03047 
03048 
03049 //Counts the number of live mercs in any given sector.
03050 UINT8 PlayerMercsInSector( UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY, UINT8 ubSectorZ )
03051 {
03052       GROUP *pGroup;
03053       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
03054       UINT8 ubNumMercs = 0;
03055       pGroup = gpGroupList;
03056       while( pGroup )
03057       {
03058             if( pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fBetweenSectors)
03059             { 
03060                   if ( pGroup->ubSectorX == ubSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == ubSectorY && pGroup->ubSectorZ == ubSectorZ )
03061                   {
03062                         //we have a group, make sure that it isn't a group containing only dead members.
03063                         pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
03064                         while( pPlayer )
03065                         {
03066                               // robots count as mercs here, because they can fight, but vehicles don't
03067                               if( ( pPlayer->pSoldier->bLife ) && !( pPlayer->pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
03068                               {
03069                                     ubNumMercs++;
03070                               }
03071                               pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
03072                         }
03073                   }
03074             }
03075             pGroup = pGroup->next;
03076       }
03077       return ubNumMercs;
03078 }
03079 
03080 UINT8 PlayerGroupsInSector( UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY, UINT8 ubSectorZ )
03081 {
03082       GROUP *pGroup;
03083       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
03084       UINT8 ubNumGroups = 0;
03085       pGroup = gpGroupList;
03086       while( pGroup )
03087       {
03088             if( pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->fBetweenSectors)
03089             { 
03090                   if ( pGroup->ubSectorX == ubSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == ubSectorY && pGroup->ubSectorZ == ubSectorZ )
03091                   {
03092                         //we have a group, make sure that it isn't a group containing only dead members.
03093                         pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
03094                         while( pPlayer )
03095                         {
03096                               if( pPlayer->pSoldier->bLife )
03097                               {
03098                                     ubNumGroups++;
03099                                     break;
03100                               }
03101                               pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
03102                         }
03103                   }
03104             }
03105             pGroup = pGroup->next;
03106       }
03107       return ubNumGroups;
03108 }

03162 
03163 //Add this group to the current battle fray!
03164 //NOTE:  For enemies, only MAX_STRATEGIC_TEAM_SIZE at a time can be in a battle, so
03165 //if it ever gets past that, god help the player, but we'll have to insert them
03166 //as those slots free up.
03167 void HandleArrivalOfReinforcements( GROUP *pGroup )
03168 {
03169       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
03170       SECTORINFO *pSector;
03171       INT32 iNumEnemiesInSector;
03172       INT32 cnt;
03173 
03174       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
03175       { //We don't have to worry about filling up the player slots, because it is impossible
03176             //to have more player's in the game then the number of slots available for the player.
03177             PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
03178             UINT8 ubStrategicInsertionCode;
03179             //First, determine which entrypoint to use, based on the travel direction of the group.
03180             if( pGroup->ubSectorX < pGroup->ubPrevX )
03181                   ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_EAST;
03182             else if( pGroup->ubSectorX > pGroup->ubPrevX )
03183                   ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_WEST;
03184             else if( pGroup->ubSectorY < pGroup->ubPrevY )
03185                   ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_SOUTH;
03186             else if( pGroup->ubSectorY > pGroup->ubPrevY )
03187                   ubStrategicInsertionCode = INSERTION_CODE_NORTH;
03188             else
03189             {
03190                   Assert( 0 );
03191                   return;
03192             }
03193             pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
03194 
03195             cnt = 0;
03196 
03197             while( pPlayer )
03198             {
03199                   pSoldier = pPlayer->pSoldier;
03200                   Assert( pSoldier );
03201                   pSoldier->ubStrategicInsertionCode = ubStrategicInsertionCode;
03202                   UpdateMercInSector( pSoldier, pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, 0 );
03203                   pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
03204 
03205                   // DO arrives quote....
03206                   if ( cnt == 0 )
03207                   {
03208                         TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_MERC_REACHED_DESTINATION );
03209                   }
03210                   cnt++;
03211             }
03212             ScreenMsg( FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, Message[ STR_PLAYER_REINFORCEMENTS ] );
03213 
03214       }
03215       else
03216       {
03217             gfPendingEnemies = TRUE;
03218             ResetMortarsOnTeamCount();
03219             AddPossiblePendingEnemiesToBattle();
03220       }
03221       //Update the known number of enemies in the sector.
03222       pSector = &SectorInfo[ SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY ) ];
03223       iNumEnemiesInSector = NumEnemiesInSector( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
03224       if( iNumEnemiesInSector )
03225       {
03226             if( pSector->bLastKnownEnemies >= 0 )
03227             {
03228                   pSector->bLastKnownEnemies = (INT8)iNumEnemiesInSector;
03229             }
03230             //if we don't know how many enemies there are, then we can't update this value.
03231       }
03232       else
03233       {
03234             pSector->bLastKnownEnemies = 0;
03235       }
03236 }
03237 
03238 BOOLEAN PlayersBetweenTheseSectors( INT16 sSource, INT16 sDest, INT32 *iCountEnter, INT32 *iCountExit, BOOLEAN *fAboutToArriveEnter )
03239 {
03240       GROUP *curr = gpGroupList;
03241       INT16 sBattleSector = -1;
03242       BOOLEAN fMayRetreatFromBattle = FALSE;
03243       BOOLEAN fRetreatingFromBattle = FALSE;
03244       BOOLEAN fHandleRetreats = FALSE;
03245       BOOLEAN fHelicopterGroup = FALSE;
03246       UINT8 ubMercsInGroup = 0;
03247 
03248 
03249       *iCountEnter = 0;
03250       *iCountExit = 0;
03251       *fAboutToArriveEnter = FALSE;
03252 
03253 
03254       if( gpBattleGroup )
03255       {
03256             Assert( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive );
03257             sBattleSector = (INT16)SECTOR( gpBattleGroup->ubSectorX, gpBattleGroup->ubSectorY );
03258       }
03259 
03260       // debug only
03261       if ( gfDisplayPotentialRetreatPaths == TRUE )
03262       {
03263             Assert( gfPreBattleInterfaceActive );
03264       }
03265 
03266 
03267       // get number of characters entering/existing between these two sectors.  Special conditions during 
03268       // pre-battle interface to return where this function is used to show potential retreating directions instead!
03269 
03270       //    check all groups
03271       while( curr )
03272       {
03273             // if player group
03274             if( curr->fPlayer == TRUE )
03275             {
03276                   fHelicopterGroup = IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( curr );
03277 
03278                   // if this group is aboard the helicopter and we're showing the airspace layer, don't count any mercs aboard the
03279                   // chopper, because the chopper icon itself serves the function of showing the location/size of this group
03280                   if ( !fHelicopterGroup || !fShowAircraftFlag )
03281                   {
03282                         // if only showing retreat paths, ignore groups not in the battle sector
03283                         // if NOT showing retreat paths, ignore groups not between sectors
03284                         if ( ( gfDisplayPotentialRetreatPaths == TRUE ) && ( sBattleSector == sSource ) ||
03285                                      ( gfDisplayPotentialRetreatPaths == FALSE ) && ( curr->fBetweenSectors == TRUE ) )
03286                         {
03287                               fMayRetreatFromBattle = FALSE;
03288                               fRetreatingFromBattle = FALSE;
03289 
03290                               if( ( sBattleSector == sSource ) && ( SECTOR( curr -> ubSectorX, curr -> ubSectorY ) == sSource ) && ( SECTOR( curr -> ubPrevX, curr->ubPrevY ) == sDest ) )
03291                               {
03292                                     fMayRetreatFromBattle = TRUE;
03293                               }
03294 
03295                               if( ( sBattleSector == sDest ) && ( SECTOR( curr -> ubSectorX, curr -> ubSectorY ) == sDest ) && ( SECTOR( curr -> ubPrevX, curr->ubPrevY ) == sSource ) )
03296                               {
03297                                     fRetreatingFromBattle = TRUE;
03298                               }
03299 
03300                               ubMercsInGroup = curr->ubGroupSize;
03301 
03302                               if( ( ( SECTOR( curr -> ubSectorX, curr -> ubSectorY ) == sSource ) && ( SECTOR( curr -> ubNextX, curr->ubNextY ) == sDest) ) || ( fMayRetreatFromBattle == TRUE ) )
03303                               {
03304                                     // if it's a valid vehicle, but not the helicopter (which can fly empty)
03305                                     if ( curr->fVehicle && !fHelicopterGroup && ( GivenMvtGroupIdFindVehicleId( curr->ubGroupID ) != -1 ) )
03306                                     {
03307                                           // make sure empty vehicles (besides helicopter) aren't in motion!
03308                                           Assert( ubMercsInGroup > 0 );
03309                                           // subtract 1, we don't wanna count the vehicle itself for purposes of showing a number on the map
03310                                           ubMercsInGroup--;
03311                                     }
03312 
03313                                     *iCountEnter += ubMercsInGroup;
03314 
03315                                     if( ( curr->uiArrivalTime - GetWorldTotalMin( ) <= ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE_DELAY ) || ( fMayRetreatFromBattle == TRUE ) )
03316                                     {
03317                                           *fAboutToArriveEnter = TRUE;
03318                                     }
03319                               }
03320                               else if( ( SECTOR( curr -> ubSectorX, curr -> ubSectorY ) == sDest )&&( SECTOR( curr -> ubNextX, curr->ubNextY ) == sSource) || ( fRetreatingFromBattle == TRUE ) )
03321                               {
03322                                     // if it's a valid vehicle, but not the helicopter (which can fly empty)
03323                                     if ( curr->fVehicle && !fHelicopterGroup && ( GivenMvtGroupIdFindVehicleId( curr->ubGroupID ) != -1 ) )
03324                                     {
03325                                           // make sure empty vehicles (besides helicopter) aren't in motion!
03326                                           Assert( ubMercsInGroup > 0 );
03327                                           // subtract 1, we don't wanna count the vehicle itself for purposes of showing a number on the map
03328                                           ubMercsInGroup--;
03329                                     }
03330 
03331                                     *iCountExit += ubMercsInGroup;
03332                               }
03333                         }
03334                   }
03335             }
03336 
03337             // next group
03338             curr = curr->next;
03339       }
03340 
03341       // if there was actually anyone leaving this sector and entering next
03342       if( *iCountEnter > 0 )
03343       {
03344             return ( TRUE );
03345       }
03346       else
03347       {
03348             return( FALSE );
03349       }
03350 }
03351 
03352 void MoveAllGroupsInCurrentSectorToSector( UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY, UINT8 ubSectorZ )
03353 {
03354       GROUP *pGroup;
03355       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
03356       pGroup = gpGroupList;
03357       while( pGroup )
03358       {
03359             if( pGroup->fPlayer && pGroup->ubSectorX == gWorldSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == gWorldSectorY &&
03360                     pGroup->ubSectorZ == gbWorldSectorZ && !pGroup->fBetweenSectors )
03361             { //This player group is in the currently loaded sector...
03362                   pGroup->ubSectorX = ubSectorX;
03363                   pGroup->ubSectorY = ubSectorY;
03364                   pGroup->ubSectorZ = ubSectorZ;
03365                   pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
03366                   while( pPlayer )
03367                   {
03368                         pPlayer->pSoldier->sSectorX = ubSectorX;
03369                         pPlayer->pSoldier->sSectorY = ubSectorY;
03370                         pPlayer->pSoldier->bSectorZ = ubSectorZ;
03371                         pPlayer->pSoldier->fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
03372                         pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
03373                   }
03374             }
03375             pGroup = pGroup->next;
03376       }
03377       CheckAndHandleUnloadingOfCurrentWorld();
03378 }
03379 
03380 
03381 void GetGroupPosition( UINT8 *ubNextX, UINT8 *ubNextY, UINT8 *ubPrevX, UINT8 *ubPrevY, UINT32 *uiTraverseTime, UINT32 *uiArriveTime, UINT8 ubGroupId )
03382 {
03383       GROUP *pGroup;
03384 
03385       // get the group
03386       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupId );
03387       
03388       // make sure it is valid
03389       
03390       // no group
03391       if( pGroup == NULL )
03392       {
03393             *ubNextX = 0;
03394             *ubNextY = 0; 
03395             *ubPrevX = 0; 
03396             *ubPrevY = 0;
03397             *uiTraverseTime = 0;
03398             *uiArriveTime = 0;
03399             return;
03400       }
03401 
03402       // valid group, grab values
03403       *ubNextX = pGroup->ubNextX;
03404       *ubNextY = pGroup->ubNextY; 
03405       *ubPrevX = pGroup->ubPrevX; 
03406       *ubPrevY = pGroup->ubPrevY;
03407       *uiTraverseTime = pGroup->uiTraverseTime;
03408       *uiArriveTime = pGroup->uiArrivalTime;
03409 
03410 
03411       return;
03412 }
03413 
03414 
03415 // this is only for grunts who were in mvt groups between sectors and are set to a new squad...NOTHING ELSE!!!!!
03416 void SetGroupPosition( UINT8 ubNextX, UINT8 ubNextY, UINT8 ubPrevX, UINT8 ubPrevY, UINT32 uiTraverseTime, UINT32 uiArriveTime, UINT8 ubGroupId )
03417 {
03418       GROUP *pGroup;
03419       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
03420 
03421 
03422       // get the group
03423       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupId );
03424       
03425       // no group
03426       if( pGroup == NULL )
03427       {
03428             
03429             return;
03430       }
03431 
03432       // valid group, grab values
03433       pGroup->ubNextX = ubNextX;
03434       pGroup->ubNextY = ubNextY ; 
03435       pGroup->ubPrevX = ubPrevX; 
03436       pGroup->ubPrevY = ubPrevY;
03437       pGroup->uiTraverseTime = uiTraverseTime;
03438       SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, uiArriveTime );
03439       pGroup->fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
03440 
03441 
03442       AddWaypointToPGroup( pGroup, pGroup->ubNextX, pGroup->ubNextY );
03443       //now, if player group set all grunts in the group to be between secotrs
03444       if( pGroup->fPlayer == TRUE )
03445       {
03446             pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
03447             while( pPlayer )
03448             {
03449                   pPlayer->pSoldier->fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
03450                   pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
03451             }
03452       }
03453 
03454 
03455       return;
03456 }
03457 
03458 BOOLEAN SaveStrategicMovementGroupsToSaveGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
03459 {
03460       GROUP *pGroup=NULL;
03461       UINT32      uiNumberOfGroups=0;
03462       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
03463 
03464       pGroup = gpGroupList;
03465 
03466       //Count the number of active groups
03467       while( pGroup )
03468       {
03469             uiNumberOfGroups++;
03470             pGroup = pGroup->next;
03471       }
03472 
03473 
03474       // Save the number of movement groups to the saved game file
03475       FileWrite( hFile, &uiNumberOfGroups, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03476       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03477       {
03478             //Error Writing size of L.L. to disk
03479             return( FALSE );
03480       }
03481 
03482       
03483       pGroup = gpGroupList;
03484 
03485       //Loop through the linked lists and add each node
03486       while( pGroup )
03487       {
03488             // Save each node in the LL
03489             FileWrite( hFile, pGroup, sizeof( GROUP ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03490             if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( GROUP ) )
03491             {
03492                   //Error Writing group node to disk
03493                   return( FALSE );
03494             }
03495 
03496             //
03497             // Save the linked list, for the current type of group
03498             //
03499 
03500             // If its a player group
03501             if( pGroup->fPlayer )
03502             {
03503                   //if there is a player list, add it
03504                   if( pGroup->ubGroupSize )
03505                   {
03506                         //Save the player group list
03507                         SavePlayerGroupList( hFile, pGroup );
03508                   }
03509             }
03510             else //else its an enemy group
03511             {
03512                   //Make sure the pointer is valid
03513                   Assert( pGroup->pEnemyGroup );
03514 
03515                   // 
03516                   SaveEnemyGroupStruct( hFile, pGroup );
03517             }
03518 
03519             //Save the waypoint list for the group, if they have one
03520             SaveWayPointList( hFile, pGroup );
03521 
03522 
03523 
03524             pGroup = pGroup->next;
03525       }
03526 
03527       // Save the unique id mask
03528       FileWrite( hFile, uniqueIDMask, sizeof( UINT32 ) * 8, &uiNumBytesWritten );
03529       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) * 8 )
03530       {
03531             //Error Writing size of L.L. to disk
03532             return( FALSE );
03533       }
03534 
03535 
03536       return( TRUE );
03537 }
03538 
03539 
03540 
03541 BOOLEAN LoadStrategicMovementGroupsFromSavedGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
03542 {
03543       GROUP *pGroup=NULL;
03544       GROUP *pTemp=NULL;
03545       UINT32      uiNumberOfGroups=0;
03546 //UINT32    uiNumBytesWritten=0;
03547       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead=0;
03548       UINT32      cnt;
03549       UINT32 bit, index, mask;
03550       UINT8  ubNumPlayerGroupsEmpty = 0;
03551       UINT8  ubNumEnemyGroupsEmpty = 0;
03552       UINT8  ubNumPlayerGroupsFull = 0;
03553       UINT8  ubNumEnemyGroupsFull = 0;
03554 
03555 
03556 
03557       //delete the existing group list
03558       while( gpGroupList )
03559             RemoveGroupFromList( gpGroupList );
03560 
03561 
03562       //load the number of nodes in the list
03563       FileRead( hFile, &uiNumberOfGroups, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03564       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03565       {
03566             //Error Writing size of L.L. to disk
03567             return( FALSE );
03568       }
03569 
03570       pGroup = gpGroupList;
03571 
03572       //loop through all the nodes and add them to the LL
03573       for( cnt=0; cnt< uiNumberOfGroups; cnt++ )
03574       {
03575             //allocate memory for the node
03576             pTemp = (GROUP *) MemAlloc( sizeof( GROUP ));
03577             if( pTemp == NULL )
03578                   return( FALSE );
03579             memset( pTemp, 0, sizeof( GROUP ) );
03580 
03581             //Read in the node
03582             FileRead( hFile, pTemp, sizeof( GROUP ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03583             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( GROUP ) )
03584             {
03585                   //Error Writing size of L.L. to disk
03586                   return( FALSE );
03587             }
03588 
03589 
03590             //
03591             // Add either the pointer or the linked list.
03592             //
03593             
03594             if( pTemp->fPlayer )
03595             {
03596                   //if there is a player list, add it
03597                   if( pTemp->ubGroupSize )
03598                   {
03599                         //Save the player group list
03600                         LoadPlayerGroupList( hFile, &pTemp );
03601                   }
03602             }
03603             else //else its an enemy group
03604             {
03605                   LoadEnemyGroupStructFromSavedGame( hFile, pTemp );
03606             }
03607 
03608 
03609             //Save the waypoint list for the group, if they have one
03610             LoadWayPointList( hFile, pTemp );
03611 
03612 
03613             pTemp->next = NULL;
03614 
03615             //add the node to the list
03616             
03617             //if its the firs node
03618             if( cnt == 0 )
03619             {
03620                   gpGroupList = pTemp;
03621                   pGroup = gpGroupList;
03622             }
03623             else
03624             {
03625                   pGroup->next = pTemp;
03626                   pGroup = pGroup->next;
03627             }
03628       }
03629 
03630       // Load the unique id mask
03631       FileRead( hFile, uniqueIDMask, sizeof( UINT32 ) * 8, &uiNumBytesRead );
03632 
03633       //@@@ TEMP!
03634       //Rebuild the uniqueIDMask as a very old bug broke the uniqueID assignments in extremely rare cases.
03635       memset( uniqueIDMask, 0, sizeof( UINT32 ) * 8 );
03636       pGroup = gpGroupList;
03637       while( pGroup )
03638       {
03639             if( pGroup->fPlayer )
03640             {
03641                   if( pGroup->ubGroupSize )
03642                   {
03643                         ubNumPlayerGroupsFull++;
03644                   }
03645                   else
03646                   {
03647                         ubNumPlayerGroupsEmpty++;
03648                   }
03649             }
03650             else
03651             {
03652                   if( pGroup->ubGroupSize )
03653                   {
03654                         ubNumEnemyGroupsFull++;
03655                   }
03656                   else
03657                   {
03658                         ubNumEnemyGroupsEmpty++;
03659                   }
03660             }
03661             if( ubNumPlayerGroupsEmpty || ubNumEnemyGroupsEmpty )
03662             {
03663                   //report error?
03664             }
03665             index = pGroup->ubGroupID / 32;
03666             bit = pGroup->ubGroupID % 32;
03667             mask = 1 << bit;
03668             uniqueIDMask[ index ] += mask;
03669             pGroup = pGroup->next;
03670       }
03671 
03672       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) * 8 )
03673       {
03674             return( FALSE );
03675       }
03676 
03677       return( TRUE );
03678 }
03679 
03680 
03681 //Saves the Player's group list to the saved game file
03682 BOOLEAN SavePlayerGroupList( HWFILE hFile, GROUP *pGroup )
03683 {
03684       UINT32      uiNumberOfNodesInList=0;
03685       PLAYERGROUP       *pTemp=NULL;
03686       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
03687       UINT32      uiProfileID;
03688 
03689       pTemp = pGroup->pPlayerList;
03690 
03691       while( pTemp )
03692       {
03693             uiNumberOfNodesInList++;
03694             pTemp = pTemp->next;
03695       }
03696 
03697       //Save the number of nodes in the list
03698       FileWrite( hFile, &uiNumberOfNodesInList, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03699       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03700       {
03701             //Error Writing size of L.L. to disk
03702             return( FALSE );
03703       }
03704 
03705       pTemp = pGroup->pPlayerList;
03706 
03707       //Loop trhough and save only the players profile id
03708       while( pTemp )
03709       {
03710             // Save the ubProfile ID for this node
03711             uiProfileID = pTemp->ubProfileID;
03712             FileWrite( hFile, &uiProfileID, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03713             if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03714             {
03715                   //Error Writing size of L.L. to disk
03716                   return( FALSE );
03717             }
03718 
03719             pTemp = pTemp->next;
03720       }
03721 
03722       return( TRUE );
03723 }

03726 
03727 BOOLEAN LoadPlayerGroupList( HWFILE hFile, GROUP **pGroup )
03728 {
03729       UINT32      uiNumberOfNodesInList=0;
03730       PLAYERGROUP       *pTemp=NULL;
03731       PLAYERGROUP       *pHead=NULL;
03732       UINT32      uiNumberOfNodes=0;
03733       UINT32      uiProfileID=0;
03734       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
03735       UINT32      cnt=0;
03736       INT16       sTempID;
03737       GROUP       *pTempGroup = *pGroup;
03738 
03739 //    pTemp = pGroup;
03740 
03741 //    pHead = *pGroup->pPlayerList;
03742 
03743       // Load the number of nodes in the player list
03744       FileRead( hFile, &uiNumberOfNodes, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03745       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03746       {
03747             //Error Writing size of L.L. to disk
03748             return( FALSE );
03749       }
03750 
03751 
03752       //loop through all the nodes and set them up
03753       for( cnt=0; cnt< uiNumberOfNodes; cnt++)
03754       {
03755             //allcate space for the current node
03756             pTemp = (PLAYERGROUP *) MemAlloc( sizeof( PLAYERGROUP ) );
03757             if( pTemp == NULL )
03758                   return( FALSE );
03759 
03760             
03761             // Load the ubProfile ID for this node
03762             FileRead( hFile, &uiProfileID, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03763             if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03764             {
03765                   //Error Writing size of L.L. to disk
03766                   return( FALSE );
03767             }
03768 
03769             //Set up the current node
03770             pTemp->ubProfileID = (UINT8)uiProfileID;
03771             sTempID = GetSoldierIDFromMercID( pTemp->ubProfileID );
03772 
03773             //Should never happen
03774             Assert( sTempID != -1 );
03775             pTemp->ubID = (UINT8) sTempID;
03776 
03777             pTemp->pSoldier = &Menptr[ pTemp->ubID ];
03778 
03779             pTemp->next = NULL;
03780 
03781             //if its the first time through
03782             if( cnt == 0 )
03783             {
03784                   pTempGroup->pPlayerList = pTemp;
03785                   pHead = pTemp;
03786             }
03787             else
03788             {
03789                   pHead->next = pTemp;
03790 
03791                   //move to the next node
03792                   pHead = pHead->next;
03793             }
03794       }
03795 
03796       return( TRUE );
03797 }

03843 
03844 void CheckMembersOfMvtGroupAndComplainAboutBleeding( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
03845 {
03846       // run through members of group
03847       UINT8 ubGroupId = pSoldier -> ubGroupID;
03848       GROUP *pGroup;
03849       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer=NULL;
03850       SOLDIERTYPE *pCurrentSoldier=NULL;
03851 
03852       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupId );
03853 
03854       // valid group?
03855       if( pGroup == NULL )
03856       {
03857             return;
03858       }
03859 
03860       // player controlled group?
03861       if( pGroup->fPlayer == FALSE )
03862       {
03863             return;
03864       }
03865 
03866       // make sure there are members in the group..if so, then run through and make each bleeder compain
03867       pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
03868       
03869       // is there a player list?
03870       if( pPlayer == NULL )
03871       {
03872             return;
03873       }
03874 
03875       BeginLoggingForBleedMeToos( TRUE );
03876       
03877       while( pPlayer )
03878       {
03879             pCurrentSoldier = pPlayer->pSoldier; 
03880 
03881             if( pCurrentSoldier->bBleeding > 0 )
03882             {
03883                   // complain about bleeding
03884                   TacticalCharacterDialogue( pCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_STARTING_TO_BLEED );
03885             }
03886             pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
03887 
03888       }
03889 
03890       BeginLoggingForBleedMeToos( FALSE );
03891 
03892 }

03895 BOOLEAN SaveWayPointList( HWFILE hFile, GROUP *pGroup )
03896 {
03897       UINT32      cnt=0;
03898       UINT32      uiNumberOfWayPoints=0;
03899       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
03900       WAYPOINT *pWayPoints = pGroup->pWaypoints;
03901 
03902       //loop trhough and count all the node in the waypoint list
03903       while( pWayPoints != NULL )
03904       {
03905             uiNumberOfWayPoints++;
03906             pWayPoints = pWayPoints->next;
03907       }
03908 
03909       //Save the number of waypoints
03910       FileWrite( hFile, &uiNumberOfWayPoints, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03911       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03912       {
03913             //Error Writing size of L.L. to disk
03914             return( FALSE );
03915       }
03916 
03917 
03918       if( uiNumberOfWayPoints )
03919       {
03920             pWayPoints = pGroup->pWaypoints;
03921             for(cnt=0; cnt<uiNumberOfWayPoints; cnt++)
03922             {
03923                   //Save the waypoint node
03924                   FileWrite( hFile, pWayPoints, sizeof( WAYPOINT ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
03925                   if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( WAYPOINT ) )
03926                   {
03927                         //Error Writing size of L.L. to disk
03928                         return( FALSE );
03929                   }
03930 
03931                   //Advance to the next waypoint
03932                   pWayPoints = pWayPoints->next;
03933             }
03934       }
03935 
03936       return( TRUE );
03937 }

03941 BOOLEAN LoadWayPointList(HWFILE hFile, GROUP *pGroup )
03942 {
03943       UINT32      cnt=0;
03944       UINT32      uiNumberOfWayPoints=0;
03945       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead=0;
03946       WAYPOINT *pWayPoints = pGroup->pWaypoints;
03947       WAYPOINT *pTemp=NULL;
03948 
03949 
03950       //Load the number of waypoints
03951       FileRead( hFile, &uiNumberOfWayPoints, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03952       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
03953       {
03954             //Error Writing size of L.L. to disk
03955             return( FALSE );
03956       }
03957 
03958 
03959       if( uiNumberOfWayPoints )
03960       {
03961             pWayPoints = pGroup->pWaypoints;
03962             for(cnt=0; cnt<uiNumberOfWayPoints; cnt++)
03963             {
03964                   //Allocate memory for the node
03965                   pTemp = (WAYPOINT *) MemAlloc( sizeof( WAYPOINT ) );
03966                   if( pTemp == NULL )
03967                         return( FALSE );
03968                   memset( pTemp, 0, sizeof( WAYPOINT ) );
03969 
03970                   //Load the waypoint node
03971                   FileRead( hFile, pTemp, sizeof( WAYPOINT ), &uiNumBytesRead );
03972                   if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( WAYPOINT ) )
03973                   {
03974                         //Error Writing size of L.L. to disk
03975                         return( FALSE );
03976                   }
03977 
03978 
03979                   pTemp->next = NULL;
03980 
03981 
03982                   //if its the first node
03983                   if( cnt == 0 )
03984                   {
03985                         pGroup->pWaypoints = pTemp;
03986                         pWayPoints = pTemp;
03987                   }
03988                   else
03989                   {
03990                         pWayPoints->next = pTemp;
03991 
03992                         //Advance to the next waypoint
03993                         pWayPoints = pWayPoints->next;
03994                   }
03995             }
03996       }
03997       else
03998             pGroup->pWaypoints = NULL;
03999 
04000       return( TRUE );
04001 }
04002 
04003 void CalculateGroupRetreatSector( GROUP *pGroup )
04004 {
04005       SECTORINFO *pSector;
04006       UINT32 uiSectorID;
04007 
04008       uiSectorID = SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
04009       pSector = &SectorInfo[ uiSectorID ];
04010 
04011       if( pSector->ubTraversability[ NORTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE ] != GROUNDBARRIER &&
04012                   pSector->ubTraversability[ NORTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE ] != EDGEOFWORLD )
04013       {
04014             pGroup->ubPrevX = pGroup->ubSectorX;
04015             pGroup->ubPrevY = pGroup->ubSectorY - 1;
04016       }
04017       else if( pSector->ubTraversability[ EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE ] != GROUNDBARRIER &&
04018                   pSector->ubTraversability[ EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE ] != EDGEOFWORLD )
04019       {
04020             pGroup->ubPrevX = pGroup->ubSectorX + 1;
04021             pGroup->ubPrevY = pGroup->ubSectorY;
04022       }
04023       else if( pSector->ubTraversability[ WEST_STRATEGIC_MOVE ] != GROUNDBARRIER &&
04024                   pSector->ubTraversability[ WEST_STRATEGIC_MOVE ] != EDGEOFWORLD )
04025       {
04026             pGroup->ubPrevX = pGroup->ubSectorX - 1;
04027             pGroup->ubPrevY = pGroup->ubSectorY;
04028       }
04029       else if( pSector->ubTraversability[ SOUTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE ] != GROUNDBARRIER &&
04030                   pSector->ubTraversability[ SOUTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE ] != EDGEOFWORLD )
04031       {
04032             pGroup->ubPrevX = pGroup->ubSectorX;
04033             pGroup->ubPrevY = pGroup->ubSectorY + 1;
04034       }
04035       else 
04036       {
04037             AssertMsg( 0, String("Player group cannot retreat from sector %c%d ", pGroup->ubSectorY+'A'-1, pGroup->ubSectorX ) );
04038             return;
04039       }
04040       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
04041       { //update the previous sector for the mercs
04042             PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
04043             pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
04044             while( pPlayer )
04045             {
04046                   pPlayer->pSoldier->ubPrevSectorID = (UINT8)SECTOR( pGroup->ubPrevX, pGroup->ubPrevY );
04047                   pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
04048             }
04049       }
04050 }
04051 
04052 //Called when all checks have been made for the group (if possible to retreat, etc.)  This function
04053 //blindly determines where to move the group.
04054 void RetreatGroupToPreviousSector( GROUP *pGroup )
04055 {
04056       UINT8 ubSector, ubDirection = 255;
04057       INT32 iVehId, dx, dy;
04058       Assert( pGroup );
04059       AssertMsg( !pGroup->fBetweenSectors, "Can't retreat a group when between sectors!" );
04060 
04061       if( pGroup->ubPrevX != 16 || pGroup->ubPrevY != 16 )
04062       { //Group has a previous sector
04063             pGroup->ubNextX = pGroup->ubPrevX;
04064             pGroup->ubNextY = pGroup->ubPrevY;
04065 
04066             //Determine the correct direction.
04067             dx = pGroup->ubNextX - pGroup->ubSectorX;
04068             dy = pGroup->ubNextY - pGroup->ubSectorY;
04069             if( dy == -1 && !dx )
04070                   ubDirection = NORTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
04071             else if( dx == 1 && !dy )
04072                   ubDirection = EAST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
04073             else if( dy == 1 && !dx )
04074                   ubDirection = SOUTH_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
04075             else if( dx == -1 && !dy )
04076                   ubDirection = WEST_STRATEGIC_MOVE;
04077             else 
04078             {
04079 
04080                   AssertMsg( 0, String("Player group attempting illegal retreat from %c%d to %c%d.", 
04081                         pGroup->ubSectorY+'A'-1, pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubNextY+'A'-1, pGroup->ubNextX ) );
04082             }
04083       }
04084       else
04085       { //Group doesn't have a previous sector.  Create one, then recurse
04086             CalculateGroupRetreatSector( pGroup );
04087             RetreatGroupToPreviousSector( pGroup );
04088       }
04089 
04090       //Calc time to get to next waypoint...
04091       ubSector = (UINT8)SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
04092       pGroup->uiTraverseTime = GetSectorMvtTimeForGroup( ubSector, ubDirection, pGroup );
04093       if( pGroup->uiTraverseTime == 0xffffffff )
04094       {
04095             AssertMsg( 0, String("Group %d (%s) attempting illegal move from %c%d to %c%d (%s).", 
04096                         pGroup->ubGroupID, ( pGroup->fPlayer ) ? "Player" : "AI",
04097                         pGroup->ubSectorY+'A', pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubNextY+'A', pGroup->ubNextX,
04098                         gszTerrain[SectorInfo[ubSector].ubTraversability[ubDirection]] ) );
04099       }
04100 
04101       if( !pGroup->uiTraverseTime )
04102       { //Because we are in the strategic layer, don't make the arrival instantaneous (towns).
04103             pGroup->uiTraverseTime = 5;
04104       }
04105 
04106       SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, GetWorldTotalMin() + pGroup->uiTraverseTime );
04107       pGroup->fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
04108       pGroup->uiFlags |= GROUPFLAG_JUST_RETREATED_FROM_BATTLE;
04109 
04110       if( pGroup->fVehicle == TRUE )
04111       {
04112             // vehicle, set fact it is between sectors too
04113             if( ( iVehId = ( GivenMvtGroupIdFindVehicleId( pGroup->ubGroupID ) ) ) != -1 )
04114             {
04115                   pVehicleList[ iVehId ].fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
04116             }
04117       }
04118 
04119       //Post the event!
04120       if( !AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->uiArrivalTime, pGroup->ubGroupID ) )
04121             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed to add movement event." );
04122 
04123       //For the case of player groups, we need to update the information of the soldiers.
04124       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
04125       {
04126             PLAYERGROUP *curr;
04127             curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
04128             
04129             if( pGroup->uiArrivalTime - ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE_DELAY > GetWorldTotalMin( ) )
04130             {
04131                   AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE, pGroup->uiArrivalTime - ABOUT_TO_ARRIVE_DELAY, pGroup->ubGroupID ); 
04132             }
04133 
04134 
04135             while( curr )
04136             {
04137                   curr->pSoldier->fBetweenSectors = TRUE;
04138 
04139                   // OK, Remove the guy from tactical engine!
04140                   RemoveSoldierFromTacticalSector( curr->pSoldier, TRUE );
04141 
04142                   curr = curr->next;
04143             }
04144       }
04145 }
04146 
04147 GROUP* FindMovementGroupInSector( UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY, BOOLEAN fPlayer )
04148 {
04149       GROUP *pGroup;
04150       pGroup = gpGroupList;
04151       while( pGroup )
04152       {
04153             if( pGroup->fPlayer )
04154             {
04155                   // NOTE: These checks must always match the INVOLVED group checks in PBI!!!
04156                   if( fPlayer && pGroup->ubGroupSize && !pGroup->fBetweenSectors && 
04157                               pGroup->ubSectorX == ubSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == ubSectorY && !pGroup->ubSectorZ &&
04158                               !GroupHasInTransitDeadOrPOWMercs( pGroup ) &&
04159                         ( !IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( pGroup ) || !fHelicopterIsAirBorne ) )
04160                   {
04161                         return pGroup;
04162                   }
04163             }
04164             else if( !fPlayer && pGroup->ubSectorX == ubSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == ubSectorY && !pGroup->ubSectorZ )
04165                   return pGroup;
04166 
04167             pGroup = pGroup->next;
04168       }
04169       return NULL;
04170 }
04171 
04172 BOOLEAN GroupAtFinalDestination( GROUP *pGroup )
04173 {
04174       WAYPOINT *wp;
04175       
04176       if( pGroup->ubMoveType != ONE_WAY )
04177             return FALSE; //Group will continue to patrol, hence never stops.
04178 
04179       //Determine if we are at the final waypoint.
04180       wp = GetFinalWaypoint( pGroup );
04181 
04182       if( !wp )
04183       { //no waypoints, so the group is at it's destination.  This happens when
04184             //an enemy group is created in the destination sector (which is legal for
04185             //staging groups which always stop adjacent to their real sector destination)
04186             return TRUE;
04187       }
04188 
04189       // if we're there
04190       if( ( pGroup->ubSectorX == wp->x ) && ( pGroup->ubSectorY == wp->y ) )
04191       {
04192             return TRUE;
04193       }
04194 
04195       return FALSE;
04196 }
04197 
04198 WAYPOINT *GetFinalWaypoint( GROUP *pGroup )
04199 {
04200       WAYPOINT *wp;
04201 
04202       Assert( pGroup );
04203 
04204       //Make sure they're on a one way route, otherwise this request is illegal
04205       Assert( pGroup->ubMoveType == ONE_WAY );
04206 
04207       wp = pGroup->pWaypoints;
04208       if( wp )
04209       {
04210             while( wp->next )
04211             {
04212                   wp = wp->next;
04213             }
04214       }
04215 
04216       return( wp );
04217 }
04218 
04219 
04220 //The sector supplied resets ALL enemy groups in the sector specified.  See comments in 
04221 //ResetMovementForEnemyGroup() for more details on what the resetting does.
04222 void ResetMovementForEnemyGroupsInLocation( UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY )
04223 {
04224       GROUP *pGroup, *next;
04225       INT16 sSectorX, sSectorY, sSectorZ;
04226 
04227       GetCurrentBattleSectorXYZ( &sSectorX, &sSectorY, &sSectorZ );
04228       pGroup = gpGroupList;
04229       while( pGroup )
04230       {
04231             next = pGroup->next;
04232             if( !pGroup->fPlayer )
04233             {
04234                   if( pGroup->ubSectorX == sSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == sSectorY )
04235                   {
04236                         ResetMovementForEnemyGroup( pGroup );
04237                   }
04238             }
04239             pGroup = next;
04240       }
04241 }
04242 
04243 
04244 //This function is used to reset the location of the enemy group if they are
04245 //currently between sectors.  If they were 50% of the way from sector A10 to A11,
04246 //then after this function is called, then that group would be 0% of the way from
04247 //sector A10 to A11.  In no way does this function effect the strategic path for
04248 //the group.
04249 void ResetMovementForEnemyGroup( GROUP *pGroup )
04250 {
04251       //Validate that the group is an enemy group and that it is moving.
04252       if( pGroup->fPlayer )
04253       {
04254             return;
04255       }
04256       if( !pGroup->fBetweenSectors || !pGroup->ubNextX || !pGroup->ubNextY )
04257       { //Reset the group's assignment by moving it to the group's original sector as it's pending group.
04258             RepollSAIGroup( pGroup );
04259             return;
04260       }
04261 
04262       //Cancel the event that is posted.
04263       DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->ubGroupID );
04264 
04265       //Calculate the new arrival time (all data pertaining to movement should be valid)
04266       if( pGroup->uiTraverseTime > 400 )
04267       { //The group was likely sleeping which makes for extremely long arrival times.  Shorten it
04268             //arbitrarily.  Doesn't really matter if this isn't accurate.
04269             pGroup->uiTraverseTime = 90;
04270       }
04271       SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, GetWorldTotalMin() + pGroup->uiTraverseTime );
04272 
04273       //Add a new event 
04274       AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->uiArrivalTime, pGroup->ubGroupID );
04275 }
04276 
04277 
04278 void UpdatePersistantGroupsFromOldSave( UINT32 uiSavedGameVersion )
04279 {
04280       GROUP       *pGroup     =     NULL;
04281       BOOLEAN fDone           = FALSE;
04282       INT32       cnt;
04283       BOOLEAN     fDoChange = FALSE;
04284 
04285       // ATE: If saved game is < 61, we need to do something better!
04286       if( uiSavedGameVersion < 61 )
04287       {     
04288             for( cnt = 0; cnt < 55; cnt++ )
04289             {
04290                   // create mvt groups
04291                   pGroup = GetGroup( (UINT8)cnt );
04292 
04293                   if( pGroup != NULL && pGroup->fPlayer )
04294                   {
04295                         pGroup->fPersistant = TRUE;
04296                   }
04297             }
04298 
04299             fDoChange = TRUE;
04300       }
04301       else if( uiSavedGameVersion < 63 )
04302       {     
04303             for( cnt = 0; cnt <  NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; cnt++ )
04304             {
04305                   // create mvt groups
04306                   pGroup = GetGroup( SquadMovementGroups[ cnt ] );
04307 
04308                   if ( pGroup != NULL )
04309                   {
04310                         pGroup->fPersistant = TRUE;
04311                   }
04312             }
04313 
04314             for( cnt = 0; cnt <  MAX_VEHICLES; cnt++ )
04315             {
04316                   pGroup = GetGroup( gubVehicleMovementGroups[ cnt ] );
04317 
04318                   if ( pGroup != NULL )
04319                   {
04320                         pGroup->fPersistant = TRUE;
04321                   }
04322             }
04323 
04324             fDoChange = TRUE;
04325       }
04326 
04327       if ( fDoChange )
04328       {
04329             //Remove all empty groups
04330             fDone = FALSE;
04331             while( !fDone )
04332             {
04333                   pGroup = gpGroupList;
04334                   while( pGroup )
04335                   {
04336                         if( !pGroup->ubGroupSize && !pGroup->fPersistant )
04337                         {
04338                               RemovePGroup( pGroup );
04339                               break; 
04340                         }
04341                         pGroup = pGroup->next;
04342                         if( !pGroup )
04343                         {
04344                               fDone = TRUE;
04345                         }
04346                   }
04347             }
04348       }
04349 }
04350 
04351 //Determines if any particular group WILL be moving through a given sector given it's current
04352 //position in the route and the pGroup->ubMoveType must be ONE_WAY.  If the group is currently 
04353 //IN the sector, or just left the sector, it will return FALSE.
04354 BOOLEAN GroupWillMoveThroughSector( GROUP *pGroup, UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY )
04355 {
04356       WAYPOINT *wp;
04357       INT32 i, dx, dy;
04358       UINT8 ubOrigX, ubOrigY;
04359 
04360       Assert( pGroup );
04361       AssertMsg( pGroup->ubMoveType == ONE_WAY, String( "GroupWillMoveThroughSector() -- Attempting to test group with an invalid move type.  ubGroupID: %d, ubMoveType: %d, sector: %c%d -- KM:0",
04362                                      pGroup->ubGroupID, pGroup->ubMoveType, pGroup->ubSectorY + 'A' - 1, pGroup->ubSectorX ) );
04363 
04364       //Preserve the original sector values, as we will be temporarily modifying the group's ubSectorX/Y values
04365       //as we traverse the waypoints.
04366       ubOrigX = pGroup->ubSectorX;
04367       ubOrigY = pGroup->ubSectorY;
04368 
04369       i = pGroup->ubNextWaypointID;
04370       wp = pGroup->pWaypoints;
04371 
04372       if( !wp )
04373       { //This is a floating group!?
04374             return FALSE;
04375       }
04376       while( i-- )
04377       { //Traverse through the waypoint list to the next waypoint ID
04378             Assert( wp );
04379             wp = wp->next;
04380       }
04381       Assert( wp );
04382 
04383       
04384       while( wp )
04385       {
04386             while( pGroup->ubSectorX != wp->x || pGroup->ubSectorY != wp->y )
04387             {
04388                   //We now have the correct waypoint.
04389                   //Analyse the group and determine which direction it will move from the current sector.
04390                   dx = wp->x - pGroup->ubSectorX;
04391                   dy = wp->y - pGroup->ubSectorY;
04392                   if( dx && dy )
04393                   { //Can't move diagonally!
04394                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "GroupWillMoveThroughSector() -- Attempting to process waypoint in a diagonal direction from sector %c%d to sector %c%d for group at sector %c%d -- KM:0", 
04395                               pGroup->ubSectorY + 'A', pGroup->ubSectorX, wp->y + 'A' - 1, wp->x, ubOrigY + 'A' - 1, ubOrigX ) );
04396                         pGroup->ubSectorX = ubOrigX;
04397                         pGroup->ubSectorY = ubOrigY;
04398                         return TRUE;
04399                   }
04400                   if( !dx && !dy ) //Can't move to position currently at!
04401                   {
04402                         AssertMsg( 0, String( "GroupWillMoveThroughSector() -- Attempting to process same waypoint at %c%d for group at %c%d -- KM:0", 
04403                               wp->y + 'A' - 1, wp->x, ubOrigY + 'A' - 1, ubOrigX ) ); 
04404                         pGroup->ubSectorX = ubOrigX;
04405                         pGroup->ubSectorY = ubOrigY;
04406                         return TRUE;
04407                   }
04408                   //Clip dx/dy value so that the move is for only one sector.
04409                   if( dx >= 1 )
04410                   {
04411                         dx = 1;
04412                   }
04413                   else if( dy >= 1 )
04414                   {
04415                         dy = 1;
04416                   }
04417                   else if( dx <= -1 )
04418                   {
04419                         dx = -1;
04420                   }
04421                   else if( dy <= -1 )
04422                   {
04423                         dy = -1;
04424                   }
04425                   else
04426                   {
04427                         Assert( 0 );
04428                         pGroup->ubSectorX = ubOrigX;
04429                         pGroup->ubSectorY = ubOrigY;
04430                         return TRUE;
04431                   }
04432                   //Advance the sector value
04433                   pGroup->ubSectorX = (UINT8)( dx + pGroup->ubSectorX );
04434                   pGroup->ubSectorY = (UINT8)( dy + pGroup->ubSectorY );
04435                   //Check to see if it the sector we are checking to see if this group will be moving through.
04436                   if( pGroup->ubSectorX == ubSectorX && pGroup->ubSectorY == ubSectorY )
04437                   {
04438                         pGroup->ubSectorX = ubOrigX;
04439                         pGroup->ubSectorY = ubOrigY;
04440                         return TRUE;
04441                   }
04442             }
04443             //Advance to the next waypoint.
04444             wp = wp->next;
04445       }
04446       pGroup->ubSectorX = ubOrigX;
04447       pGroup->ubSectorY = ubOrigY;
04448       return FALSE;
04449 }

04458 BOOLEAN VehicleHasFuel( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04459 {
04460       Assert( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE );
04461       if( pSoldier->sBreathRed )
04462       {
04463             return TRUE;
04464       }
04465       return FALSE;
04466 }
04467 
04468 INT16 VehicleFuelRemaining( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
04469 {
04470       Assert( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE );
04471       return pSoldier->sBreathRed;
04472 }
04473 
04474 BOOLEAN SpendVehicleFuel( SOLDIERTYPE* pSoldier, INT16 sFuelSpent )
04475 {
04476       Assert( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE );
04477       pSoldier->sBreathRed -= sFuelSpent;
04478       pSoldier->sBreathRed = (INT16)max( 0, pSoldier->sBreathRed );
04479       pSoldier->bBreath = (INT8)((pSoldier->sBreathRed+99) / 100);
04480       return( FALSE );
04481 }
04482 
04483 void AddFuelToVehicle( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE *pVehicle )
04484 {
04485       OBJECTTYPE *pItem;
04486       INT16 sFuelNeeded, sFuelAvailable, sFuelAdded;
04487       pItem = &pSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ];
04488       if( !Item[pItem->usItem].gascan )
04489       {
04490             #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
04491                   UINT16 str[ 100 ];
04492                   swprintf( str, L"%s is supposed to have gas can in hand.  ATE:0", pSoldier->name );
04493                   DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
04494             #endif
04495             return;
04496       }
04497       //Soldier has gas can, so now add gas to vehicle while removing gas from the gas can.
04498       //A gas can with 100 status translate to 50% of a fillup.
04499       if( pVehicle->sBreathRed == 10000 )
04500       { //Message for vehicle full?
04501             return;
04502       }
04503       if( pItem->bStatus )
04504       { //Fill 'er up.
04505             sFuelNeeded = 10000 - pVehicle->sBreathRed;
04506             sFuelAvailable = pItem->bStatus[0] * 50;
04507             sFuelAdded = min( sFuelNeeded, sFuelAvailable );
04508             //Add to vehicle
04509             pVehicle->sBreathRed += sFuelAdded;
04510             pVehicle->bBreath = (INT8)(pVehicle->sBreathRed / 100);
04511             //Subtract from item
04512             pItem->bStatus[0] = (INT8)(pItem->bStatus[0] - sFuelAdded / 50);
04513             if( !pItem->bStatus[0] )
04514             { //Gas can is empty, so toast the item.
04515                   DeleteObj( pItem );
04516             }
04517       }
04518 }

04520 void ReportVehicleOutOfGas( INT32 iVehicleID, UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY )

04525             pVehicleStrings[ pVehicleList[ iVehicleID ].ubVehicleType ],
04526             ubSectorY + 'A' - 1, ubSectorX );
04527       DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
04528 }
