04530 void SetLocationOfAllPlayerSoldiersInGroup( GROUP *pGroup, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
04531 {
04532       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer = NULL;
04533       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
04534 
04535       pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
04536       while( pPlayer )
04537       {
04538             pSoldier = pPlayer->pSoldier;
04539 
04540             if ( pSoldier != NULL )
04541             {
04542                   pSoldier->sSectorX = sSectorX;
04543                   pSoldier->sSectorY = sSectorY;
04544                   pSoldier->bSectorZ = bSectorZ;
04545             }
04546 
04547             pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
04548       }
04549 
04550 
04551       // if it's a vehicle
04552       if ( pGroup->fVehicle )
04553       {
04554             INT32 iVehicleId = -1;
04555             VEHICLETYPE *pVehicle = NULL;
04556 
04557             iVehicleId = GivenMvtGroupIdFindVehicleId( pGroup->ubGroupID );
04558             Assert ( iVehicleId != -1 );
04559 
04560             pVehicle = &( pVehicleList[ iVehicleId ] );
04561 
04562             pVehicle->sSectorX = sSectorX;
04563             pVehicle->sSectorY = sSectorY;
04564             pVehicle->sSectorZ = bSectorZ;
04565 
04566             // if it ain't the chopper
04567             if ( iVehicleId != iHelicopterVehicleId )
04568             {
04569                   pSoldier = GetSoldierStructureForVehicle( iVehicleId );
04570                   Assert ( pSoldier );
04571 
04572                   // these are apparently unnecessary, since vehicles are part of the pPlayerList in a vehicle group.  Oh well. 
04573                   pSoldier->sSectorX = sSectorX;
04574                   pSoldier->sSectorY = sSectorY;
04575                   pSoldier->bSectorZ = bSectorZ;
04576             }
04577       }
04578 }
04579 
04580 
04581 void RandomizePatrolGroupLocation( GROUP *pGroup )
04582 {     //Make sure this is an enemy patrol group
04583       WAYPOINT *wp;
04584       UINT8 ubMaxWaypointID = 0;
04585       UINT8 ubTotalWaypoints;
04586       UINT8 ubChosen;
04587       UINT8 ubSectorID;
04588 
04589       //return; //disabled for now
04590 
04591       Assert( !pGroup->fPlayer );
04592       Assert( pGroup->ubMoveType == ENDTOEND_FORWARDS );
04593       Assert( pGroup->pEnemyGroup->ubIntention == PATROL );
04594 
04595       //Search for the event, and kill it (if it exists)!
04596       DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->ubGroupID );
04597 
04598       //count the group's waypoints
04599       wp = pGroup->pWaypoints;
04600       while( wp )
04601       {
04602             if( wp->next )
04603             {
04604                   ubMaxWaypointID++;
04605             }
04606             wp = wp->next;
04607       }
04608       //double it (they go back and forth) -- it's using zero based indices, so you have to add one to get the number of actual
04609       //waypoints in one direction.
04610       ubTotalWaypoints = (UINT8)((ubMaxWaypointID) * 2);
04611 
04612       //pick the waypoint they start at
04613       ubChosen = (UINT8)Random( ubTotalWaypoints );
04614 
04615       if( ubChosen >= ubMaxWaypointID )
04616       { //They chose a waypoint going in the reverse direction, so translate it
04617             //to an actual waypointID and switch directions.  
04618             pGroup->ubMoveType = ENDTOEND_BACKWARDS;
04619             pGroup->ubNextWaypointID = ubChosen - ubMaxWaypointID;
04620             ubChosen = pGroup->ubNextWaypointID + 1;
04621       }
04622       else
04623       {
04624             pGroup->ubMoveType = ENDTOEND_FORWARDS;
04625             pGroup->ubNextWaypointID = ubChosen + 1;
04626       }
04627 
04628       //Traverse through the waypoint list again, to extract the location they are at.
04629       wp = pGroup->pWaypoints;
04630       while( wp && ubChosen )
04631       {
04632             ubChosen--;
04633             wp = wp->next;
04634       }
04635       
04636       //logic error if this fails.  We should have a null value for ubChosen
04637       Assert( !ubChosen );
04638       Assert( wp );
04639 
04640       //Move the group to the location of this chosen waypoint.
04641       ubSectorID = (UINT8)SECTOR( wp->x, wp->y );
04642 
04643       //Set up this global var to randomize the arrival time of the group from
04644       //1 minute to actual traverse time between the sectors.
04645       gfRandomizingPatrolGroup = TRUE;
04646  
04647       SetEnemyGroupSector( pGroup, ubSectorID );
04648       InitiateGroupMovementToNextSector( pGroup );
04649 
04650       //Immediately turn off the flag once finished.
04651       gfRandomizingPatrolGroup = FALSE;
04652 
04653 }
04654 
04655 //Whenever a player group arrives in a sector, and if bloodcats exist in the sector,
04656 //roll the dice to see if this will become an ambush random encounter.
04657 BOOLEAN TestForBloodcatAmbush( GROUP *pGroup )
04658 {
04659       SECTORINFO *pSector;
04660       INT32 iHoursElapsed;
04661       UINT8 ubSectorID;
04662       UINT8 ubChance;
04663       INT8 bDifficultyMaxCats;
04664       INT8 bProgressMaxCats;
04665       INT8 bNumMercMaxCats;
04666       BOOLEAN fAlreadyAmbushed = FALSE;
04667 
04668       if( pGroup->ubSectorZ )
04669       { //no ambushes underground (no bloodcats either)
04670             return FALSE;
04671       }
04672 
04673       ubSectorID = (UINT8)SECTOR( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY );
04674       pSector = &SectorInfo[ ubSectorID ];
04675 
04676       ubChance = 5 * gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel;
04677 
04678       iHoursElapsed = (GetWorldTotalMin() - pSector->uiTimeCurrentSectorWasLastLoaded) / 60;
04679       if( ubSectorID == SEC_N5 || ubSectorID == SEC_I16 )
04680       { //These are special maps -- we use all placements.
04681             if( pSector->bBloodCats == -1 )
04682             {
04683                   pSector->bBloodCats = pSector->bBloodCatPlacements;
04684             }
04685             else if( pSector->bBloodCats > 0 && pSector->bBloodCats < pSector->bBloodCatPlacements )
04686             { //Slowly have them recuperate if we haven't been here for a long time.  The population will 
04687                   //come back up to the maximum if left long enough.
04688                   INT32 iBloodCatDiff;
04689                   iBloodCatDiff = pSector->bBloodCatPlacements - pSector->bBloodCats;
04690                   pSector->bBloodCats += (INT8)min( iHoursElapsed / 18, iBloodCatDiff );
04691             }
04692             //Once 0, the bloodcats will never recupe.
04693       }
04694       else if( pSector->bBloodCats == -1 )
04695       { //If we haven't been ambushed by bloodcats yet...
04696             if( gfAutoAmbush || PreChance( ubChance ) )
04697             { 
04698                   //randomly choose from 5-8, 7-10, 9-12 bloodcats based on easy, normal, and hard, respectively
04699                   bDifficultyMaxCats = (INT8)( Random( 4 ) + gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel*2 + 3 );
04700 
04701                   //maximum of 3 bloodcats or 1 for every 6%, 5%, 4% progress based on easy, normal, and hard, respectively
04702                   bProgressMaxCats = (INT8)max( CurrentPlayerProgressPercentage() / (7 - gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel), 3 );
04703                                     
04704                   //make sure bloodcats don't outnumber mercs by a factor greater than 2
04705                   bNumMercMaxCats = (INT8)(PlayerMercsInSector( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY, pGroup->ubSectorZ ) * 2);
04706 
04707                   //choose the lowest number of cats calculated by difficulty and progress.
04708                   pSector->bBloodCats = (INT8)min( bDifficultyMaxCats, bProgressMaxCats );
04709 
04710                   if( gGameOptions.ubDifficultyLevel < DIF_LEVEL_HARD )
04711                   { //if not hard difficulty, ensure cats never outnumber mercs by a factor of 2 (min 3 bloodcats)
04712                         pSector->bBloodCats = (INT8)min( pSector->bBloodCats, bNumMercMaxCats );
04713                         pSector->bBloodCats = (INT8)max( pSector->bBloodCats, 3 );
04714                   }
04715 
04716                   //ensure that there aren't more bloodcats than placements
04717                   pSector->bBloodCats = (INT8)min( pSector->bBloodCats, pSector->bBloodCatPlacements );
04718             }
04719       }
04720       else if( ubSectorID != SEC_I16 )
04721       {
04722             if( !gfAutoAmbush && PreChance( 95 ) )
04723             { //already ambushed here.  But 5% chance of getting ambushed again!
04724                   fAlreadyAmbushed = TRUE;
04725             }
04726       }
04727 
04728       if( !fAlreadyAmbushed && ubSectorID != SEC_N5 && pSector->bBloodCats > 0 && 
04729                   !pGroup->fVehicle && !NumEnemiesInSector( pGroup->ubSectorX, pGroup->ubSectorY ) )
04730       {
04731             if( ubSectorID != SEC_I16 || !gubFact[ FACT_PLAYER_KNOWS_ABOUT_BLOODCAT_LAIR ] )
04732             {
04733                   gubEnemyEncounterCode = BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE;
04734             }
04735             else
04736             {
04737                   gubEnemyEncounterCode = ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE;
04738             }
04739             return TRUE;
04740       }
04741       else
04742       {
04743             gubEnemyEncounterCode = NO_ENCOUNTER_CODE;
04744             return FALSE;
04745       }
04746 }
04747 
04748 void NotifyPlayerOfBloodcatBattle( UINT8 ubSectorX, UINT8 ubSectorY )
04749 {
04750       UINT16 str[ 256 ];
04751       UINT16 zTempString[ 128 ];
04752       if( gubEnemyEncounterCode == BLOODCAT_AMBUSH_CODE )
04753       {
04754             GetSectorIDString( ubSectorX, ubSectorY, 0, zTempString, TRUE );
04755             swprintf( str, pMapErrorString[ 12 ], zTempString );
04756       }
04757       else if( gubEnemyEncounterCode == ENTERING_BLOODCAT_LAIR_CODE )
04758       {
04759             wcscpy( str, pMapErrorString[ 13 ] );
04760       }
04761 
04762       if( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
04763       {     //Force render mapscreen (need to update the position of the group before the dialog appears.
04764             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
04765             MapScreenHandle();
04766             InvalidateScreen();
04767             RefreshScreen( NULL );
04768       }
04769 
04770       gfUsePersistantPBI = TRUE;
04771       DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, TriggerPrebattleInterface );
04772 }

04775 
04776 void PlaceGroupInSector( UINT8 ubGroupID, INT16 sPrevX, INT16 sPrevY, INT16 sNextX, INT16 sNextY, INT8 bZ, BOOLEAN fCheckForBattle )
04777 {
04778       ClearMercPathsAndWaypointsForAllInGroup( GetGroup( ubGroupID ) );
04779 
04780       // change where they are and where they're going
04781       SetGroupPrevSectors( ubGroupID, ( UINT8 ) sPrevX, ( UINT8 ) sPrevY );
04782       SetGroupSectorValue( sPrevX, sPrevY, bZ, ubGroupID );
04783       SetGroupNextSectorValue( sNextX, sNextY, ubGroupID );
04784 
04785       // call arrive event
04786       GroupArrivedAtSector( ubGroupID, fCheckForBattle, FALSE );
04787 }

04790 
04791 // ARM: centralized it so we can do a comprehensive Assert on it.  Causing problems with helicopter group!
04792 void SetGroupArrivalTime( GROUP *pGroup, UINT32 uiArrivalTime )
04793 {
04794       // PLEASE CENTRALIZE ALL CHANGES TO THE ARRIVAL TIMES OF GROUPS THROUGH HERE, ESPECIALLY THE HELICOPTER GROUP!!!
04795 
04796       // if this group is the helicopter group, we have to make sure that its arrival time is never greater than the sum
04797       // of the current time and its traverse time, 'cause those 3 values are used to plot its map position!  Because of this
04798       // the chopper groups must NEVER be delayed for any reason - it gets excluded from simultaneous arrival logic
04799 
04800       // Also note that non-chopper groups can currently be delayed such that this assetion would fail - enemy groups by
04801       // DelayEnemyGroupsIfPathsCross(), and player groups via PrepareGroupsForSimultaneousArrival().  So we skip the assert.
04802 
04803       if ( IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( pGroup ) )
04804       {
04805             // make sure it's valid (NOTE: the correct traverse time must be set first!)
04806             if ( uiArrivalTime > ( GetWorldTotalMin() + pGroup->uiTraverseTime ) )
04807             {
04808                   AssertMsg( FALSE, String( "SetGroupArrivalTime: Setting invalid arrival time %d for group %d, WorldTime = %d, TraverseTime = %d", uiArrivalTime, pGroup->ubGroupID, GetWorldTotalMin(), pGroup->uiTraverseTime ) );
04809 
04810                   // fix it if assertions are disabled
04811                   uiArrivalTime = GetWorldTotalMin() + pGroup->uiTraverseTime;
04812             }
04813       }
04814 
04815       pGroup->uiArrivalTime = uiArrivalTime;
04816 }
04817 
04818 
04819 
04820 // non-persistent groups should be simply removed instead!
04821 void CancelEmptyPersistentGroupMovement( GROUP *pGroup )
04822 {
04823       Assert( pGroup );
04824       Assert( pGroup->ubGroupSize == 0 );
04825       Assert( pGroup->fPersistant );
04826 
04827 
04828       // don't do this for vehicle groups - the chopper can keep flying empty, 
04829       // while other vehicles still exist and teleport to nearest sector instead
04830       if ( pGroup->fVehicle )
04831       {
04832             return;
04833       }
04834 
04835       // prevent it from arriving empty
04836       DeleteStrategicEvent( EVENT_GROUP_ARRIVAL, pGroup->ubGroupID );
04837 
04838       // release memory for its waypoints
04839       RemoveGroupWaypoints( pGroup->ubGroupID );
04840 
04841       pGroup->uiTraverseTime = 0;
04842       SetGroupArrivalTime( pGroup, 0 );
04843       pGroup->fBetweenSectors = FALSE;
04844 
04845       pGroup->ubPrevX = 0;
04846       pGroup->ubPrevY = 0;
04847       pGroup->ubSectorX = 0;
04848       pGroup->ubSectorY = 0;
04849       pGroup->ubNextX = 0;
04850       pGroup->ubNextY = 0;
04851 }
04852 
04853 
04854 
04855 // look for NPCs to stop for, anyone is too tired to keep going, if all OK rebuild waypoints & continue movement
04856 void PlayerGroupArrivedSafelyInSector( GROUP *pGroup, BOOLEAN fCheckForNPCs )
04857 {
04858       BOOLEAN fPlayerPrompted = FALSE;
04859 
04860 
04861       Assert( pGroup );
04862       Assert( pGroup->fPlayer );
04863 
04864 
04865       // if we haven't already checked for NPCs, and the group isn't empty 
04866       if ( fCheckForNPCs && ( HandlePlayerGroupEnteringSectorToCheckForNPCsOfNote( pGroup ) == TRUE ) )
04867       {
04868             // wait for player to answer/confirm prompt before doing anything else
04869             fPlayerPrompted = TRUE;
04870       }
04871 
04872       // if we're not prompting the player
04873       if ( !fPlayerPrompted )
04874       {
04875             // and we're not at the end of our road
04876             if ( !GroupAtFinalDestination( pGroup ) )
04877             {
04878                   if ( AnyMercInGroupCantContinueMoving( pGroup ) )
04879                   {
04880                         // stop: clear their strategic movement (mercpaths and waypoints)
04881                         ClearMercPathsAndWaypointsForAllInGroup( pGroup );
04882 
04883                         // NOTE: Of course, it would be better if they continued onwards once everyone was ready to go again, in which
04884                         // case we'd want to preserve the plotted path, but since the player can mess with the squads, etc.
04885                         // in the mean-time, that just seemed to risky to try to support.  They could get into a fight and be too
04886                         // injured to move, etc.  Basically, we'd have run a complete CanCharacterMoveInStrategic(0 check on all of them.
04887                         // It's a wish list task for AM...
04888 
04889                         // stop time so player can react if group was already on the move and suddenly halts
04890                         StopTimeCompression();
04891                   }
04892                   else
04893                   {
04894                         // continue onwards: rebuild way points, initiate movement
04895                         RebuildWayPointsForGroupPath( GetGroupMercPathPtr( pGroup ), pGroup->ubGroupID );
04896                   }
04897             }
04898       }
04899 }
04900 
04901 
04902 
04903 BOOLEAN HandlePlayerGroupEnteringSectorToCheckForNPCsOfNote( GROUP *pGroup )
04904 {
04905       INT16 sSectorX = 0, sSectorY = 0;
04906       INT8 bSectorZ = 0;
04907       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
04908       CHAR16 wSectorName[ 128 ];
04909       INT16 sStrategicSector;
04910 
04911 
04912       Assert( pGroup );
04913       Assert( pGroup->fPlayer );
04914 
04915       // nobody in the group (perfectly legal with the chopper)
04916       if ( pGroup->pPlayerList == NULL )
04917       {
04918             return( FALSE );
04919       }
04920 
04921       // chopper doesn't stop for NPCs
04922       if ( IsGroupTheHelicopterGroup( pGroup ) )
04923       {
04924             return( FALSE );
04925       }
04926 
04927       // if we're already in the middle of a prompt (possible with simultaneously group arrivals!), don't try to prompt again
04928       if ( gpGroupPrompting != NULL )
04929       {
04930             return( FALSE );
04931       }
04932 
04933 
04934       // get the sector values
04935       sSectorX = pGroup->ubSectorX;
04936       sSectorY = pGroup->ubSectorY;
04937       bSectorZ = pGroup->ubSectorZ;
04938 
04939 
04940       // don't do this for underground sectors
04941       if ( bSectorZ != 0 )
04942       {
04943             return( FALSE );
04944       }
04945 
04946       // get the strategic sector value
04947       sStrategicSector = sSectorX + MAP_WORLD_X * sSectorY;
04948 
04949       // skip towns/pseudo-towns (anything that shows up on the map as being special)
04950       if( StrategicMap[ sStrategicSector ].bNameId != BLANK_SECTOR )
04951       {
04952             return( FALSE );
04953       }
04954 
04955       // skip SAM-sites
04956       if ( IsThisSectorASAMSector( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ ) )
04957       {
04958             return( FALSE );
04959       }
04960 
04961 
04962       // check for profiled NPCs in sector
04963       if( WildernessSectorWithAllProfiledNPCsNotSpokenWith( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ ) == FALSE )
04964       {
04965             return( FALSE );
04966       }
04967 
04968 
04969       // store the group ptr for use by the callback function
04970       gpGroupPrompting = pGroup;
04971 
04972       // build string for squad
04973       GetSectorIDString( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ, wSectorName, FALSE );
04974       swprintf( sString, pLandMarkInSectorString[ 0 ], pGroup->pPlayerList->pSoldier->bAssignment + 1, wSectorName );
04975 
04976       if ( GroupAtFinalDestination( pGroup ) )
04977       {
04978             // do an OK message box
04979             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sString, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, HandlePlayerGroupEnteringSectorToCheckForNPCsOfNoteCallback );
04980       }
04981       else
04982       {
04983             // do a CONTINUE/STOP message box
04984             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( sString, MSG_BOX_FLAG_CONTINUESTOP, HandlePlayerGroupEnteringSectorToCheckForNPCsOfNoteCallback );
04985       }
04986 
04987       // wait, we're prompting the player
04988       return( TRUE );
04989 }
04990 
04991 
04992 BOOLEAN WildernessSectorWithAllProfiledNPCsNotSpokenWith( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
04993 {
04994       UINT8                                                 ubProfile;
04995       MERCPROFILESTRUCT *           pProfile;
04996       BOOLEAN fFoundSomebody = FALSE;
04997 
04998 
04999       for ( ubProfile = FIRST_RPC; ubProfile < GASTON; ubProfile++ )
05000       {
05001             pProfile = &gMercProfiles[ ubProfile ];
05002 
05003             // skip stiffs
05004             if ( ( pProfile->bMercStatus == MERC_IS_DEAD ) || ( pProfile->bLife <= 0 ) )
05005             {
05006                   continue;
05007             }
05008 
05009             // skip vehicles
05010             if ( ubProfile >= PROF_HUMMER && ubProfile <= PROF_HELICOPTER )
05011             {
05012                   continue;
05013             }
05014 
05015             // in this sector?
05016             if ( pProfile->sSectorX == sSectorX && pProfile->sSectorY == sSectorY && pProfile->bSectorZ == bSectorZ )
05017             {
05018                   // if we haven't talked to him yet, and he's not currently recruired/escorted by player (!)
05019                   if ( ( pProfile->ubLastDateSpokenTo == 0 ) &&
05020                               !(pProfile->ubMiscFlags & (PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_RECRUITED | PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_EPCACTIVE) ) )
05021                   {
05022                         // then this is a guy we need to stop for...
05023                         fFoundSomebody = TRUE;
05024                   }
05025                   else
05026                   {
05027                         // already spoke to this guy, don't prompt about this sector again, regardless of status of other NPCs here
05028                         // (although Hamous wanders around, he never shares the same wilderness sector as other important NPCs)
05029                         return( FALSE );
05030                   }
05031             }
05032       }
05033 
05034       
05035       return( fFoundSomebody );
05036 }
05037 
05038 
05039 
05040 void HandlePlayerGroupEnteringSectorToCheckForNPCsOfNoteCallback( UINT8 ubExitValue )
05041 {
05042       Assert( gpGroupPrompting );
05043 
05044       if ( (ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES) ||
05045                    (ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_OK) )
05046       {
05047             // NPCs now checked, continue moving if appropriate
05048             PlayerGroupArrivedSafelyInSector( gpGroupPrompting, FALSE );
05049       }
05050       else if( ubExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_NO )
05051       {
05052             // stop here
05053 
05054             // clear their strategic movement (mercpaths and waypoints)
05055             ClearMercPathsAndWaypointsForAllInGroup( gpGroupPrompting );
05056 
05057 //          // if currently selected sector has nobody in it
05058 //          if ( PlayerMercsInSector( ( UINT8 ) sSelMapX, ( UINT8 ) sSelMapY, ( UINT8 ) iCurrentMapSectorZ ) == 0 )
05059             // New: ALWAYS make this sector strategically selected, even if there were mercs in the previously selected one
05060             {
05061                   ChangeSelectedMapSector( gpGroupPrompting->ubSectorX, gpGroupPrompting->ubSectorY, gpGroupPrompting->ubSectorZ );
05062             }
05063 
05064             StopTimeCompression();
05065       }
05066 
05067       gpGroupPrompting = NULL;
05068 
05069       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
05070       fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
05071 
05072       return;
05073 }
05074 
05075 
05076 BOOLEAN DoesPlayerExistInPGroup( UINT8 ubGroupID, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
05077 {
05078       GROUP *pGroup;
05079       PLAYERGROUP *curr;
05080 
05081       pGroup = GetGroup( ubGroupID );
05082   Assert( pGroup );
05083 
05084       curr = pGroup->pPlayerList;
05085       
05086       if( !curr )
05087       {
05088             return FALSE;
05089       }
05090 
05091       while( curr )
05092       { //definately more than one node
05093 
05094             if( curr->pSoldier == pSoldier )
05095             {
05096                   return TRUE;
05097             }
05098 
05099             curr = curr->next;      
05100       }
05101 
05102       // !curr
05103       return FALSE;
05104 }
05105 
05106 
05107 BOOLEAN GroupHasInTransitDeadOrPOWMercs( GROUP *pGroup )
05108 {
05109       PLAYERGROUP *pPlayer;
05110 
05111       pPlayer = pGroup->pPlayerList;
05112       while( pPlayer )
05113       {
05114             if ( pPlayer->pSoldier )
05115             {
05116                   if( ( pPlayer->pSoldier->bAssignment == IN_TRANSIT ) ||
05117                               ( pPlayer->pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) ||
05118                               ( pPlayer->pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) )
05119                   {
05120                         // yup!
05121                         return( TRUE );
05122                   }
05123             }
05124 
05125             pPlayer = pPlayer->next;
05126       }
05127 
05128       // nope
05129       return( FALSE );
05130 }
05131 
05132 UINT8 NumberMercsInVehicleGroup( GROUP *pGroup )
05133 {
05134       INT32 iVehicleID;
05135       iVehicleID = GivenMvtGroupIdFindVehicleId( pGroup->ubGroupID );
05136       Assert( iVehicleID != -1 );
05137       if( iVehicleID != -1 )
05138       {
05139             return (UINT8)GetNumberInVehicle( iVehicleID );
05140       }
05141       return 0;
05142 }

05144 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
05145 void ValidateGroups( GROUP *pGroup )
05146 {
05147       //Do error checking, and report group
05148       ValidatePlayersAreInOneGroupOnly();
05149       if( !pGroup->fPlayer && !pGroup->ubGroupSize )
05150       {
05151             //report error
05152             UINT16 str[ 512 ];
05153             if( pGroup->ubSectorIDOfLastReassignment == 255 )
05154             {
05155                   swprintf( str, L"Enemy group found with 0 troops in it.  This is illegal and group will be deleted."
05156                                                              L"  Group %d in sector %c%d originated from sector %c%d.",
05157                                                              pGroup->ubGroupID, pGroup->ubSectorY + 'A' - 1, pGroup->ubSectorX,
05158                                                              SECTORY( pGroup->ubCreatedSectorID ) + 'A' - 1, SECTORX( pGroup->ubCreatedSectorID ) );
05159             }
05160             else
05161             {
05162                   swprintf( str, L"Enemy group found with 0 troops in it.  This is illegal and group will be deleted."
05163                                                              L"  Group %d in sector %c%d originated from sector %c%d and last reassignment location was %c%d.",
05164                                                              pGroup->ubGroupID, pGroup->ubSectorY + 'A' - 1, pGroup->ubSectorX,
05165                                                              SECTORY( pGroup->ubCreatedSectorID ) + 'A' - 1, SECTORX( pGroup->ubCreatedSectorID ),
05166                                                              SECTORY( pGroup->ubSectorIDOfLastReassignment ) + 'A' - 1, SECTORX( pGroup->ubSectorIDOfLastReassignment ) );
05167             }
05168             //correct error
05169 
05170             DoScreenIndependantMessageBox( str, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
05171       }
05172 }
